translated: The absence of intrinsic nature is the aggregate of formation.🔽The formations are not perceived in the past limit,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang dmigs su med /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang dmigs su med /
translated: nor are they perceived in the future limit,

original: bar gyi mtha' yang dmigs su med de /
analyzed: bar gyi mtha' yang dmigs su med de /
translated: nor are they perceived in the present limit.

original: mi gnas pas 'du byed rnams ni skad cig gcig gis skye zhing 'gog pa'i chos can no //
analyzed: mi gnas pas 'du byed rnams ni skad cig gcig gis skye zhing 'gog pa'i chos can no //
translated: Because they do not remain, the formations are subject to arising and ceasing in a single instant.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba @41a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba @41a *//
translated: bodhisattvas understand the formations in this way, in accordance with reality.

original: bzhin du 'du byed kyi phung po la stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / sra ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sbu'i nyag ma tsam yang dmigs su med par rtogs so; ;de ltar bsams nas bus pa so so'i skye bo dag snying po med pa'i chos kyis rnam par bcings pa dang /
analyzed: bzhin du 'du byed kyi phung po la stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / sra ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / sbu'i nyag ma tsam yang dmigs su med par rtogs so; ;de ltar bsams nas bus pa so so'i skye bo dag snying po med pa'i chos kyis rnam par bcings pa dang /
translated: “When they think in this way, they will understand that childish ordinary beings are bound by phenomena that have no core,

original: 'du byed kyi phung pos rnam par bcings pa dang / chags pas rnam par bcings te; lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas 'du byed pa bskyed do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung pos rnam par bcings pa dang / chags pas rnam par bcings te; lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas 'du byed pa bskyed do //
translated: that they are bound by the aggregate of formation, and that they are bound by attachment, and that they create formations through body, speech, and mind.

original: bdag tu 'du byed pa dang / bdag gi bar 'du byed pa bskyed do //
analyzed: bdag tu 'du byed pa dang / bdag gi bar 'du byed pa bskyed do //
translated: They create formations of ‘I’ and ‘mine.’

original: de lta bu'i las bskyed pas 'du byed kyi phung pos rnam par bcings nas 'du byed kyi phung po nyid ma rig pa gti mug yin par mi shes te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i las bskyed pas 'du byed kyi phung pos rnam par bcings nas 'du byed kyi phung po nyid ma rig pa gti mug yin par mi shes te /
translated: Since they create such actions, they are bound by the aggregate of formation, and they do not understand that the aggregate of formation is ignorance and confusion.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po la yang dag par rtog go /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po la yang dag par rtog go /
translated: They think about the aggregate of formation.

original: de ltar phyin ci log gi dbang du gyur pas de la chags shing 'dzin to //
analyzed: de ltar phyin ci log gi dbang du gyur pas de la chags shing 'dzin to //
translated: Thus, under the influence of error, one becomes attached to and grasps it.

original: gang zag des de ltar 'du byed kyi phung po la chags shing 'dzin pas bar bar ni bde bar byed /
analyzed: gang zag des de ltar 'du byed kyi phung po la chags shing 'dzin pas bar bar ni bde bar byed /
translated: Since the person thus becomes attached to and grasps the aggregate of karmic predispositions, sometimes he creates happiness,

original: bar bar ni sdug bsngal bar 'du byed /
analyzed: bar bar ni sdug bsngal bar 'du byed /
translated: sometimes he creates suffering,

original: bar bar ni bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin par 'du byed do //
analyzed: bar bar ni bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin par 'du byed do //
translated: and sometimes he creates neither happiness nor suffering.

original: gang zag des bde ba la 'du byed pas bde ba'i lus thob bo //
analyzed: gang zag des bde ba la 'du byed pas bde ba'i lus thob bo //
translated: Since the person creates happiness, he obtains a happy body.

original: sdug bsngal la 'du byed pas sdug bsngal gyi lus thob bo //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la 'du byed pas sdug bsngal gyi lus thob bo //
translated: Since he creates suffering, he obtains a suffering body.

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa la 'du byed pas bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i lus thob bo //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa la 'du byed pas bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i lus thob bo //
translated: Since he creates neither happiness nor suffering, he obtains a body that is neither happy nor suffering.

original: gang zag des bde ba'i lus thob pas de la @41b 'dod pa bskyed do //
analyzed: gang zag des bde ba'i lus thob pas de la @41b 'dod pa bskyed do //
translated: Since the person obtains a happy body, he generates desire for it.

original: sdug bsngal gyi lus thob pas zhe sdang bskyed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi lus thob pas zhe sdang bskyed do //
translated: Since he obtains a suffering body, he generates hatred.

original: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i lus thob pas gti mug bskyed do //
analyzed: bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i lus thob pas gti mug bskyed do //
translated: He obtains a body that is neither pleasant nor painful, and thus he generates delusion.

original: gang zag des de ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dbang du gyur pas 'du byed kyi nyes pa'i skyon ma mthong nas /
analyzed: gang zag des de ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dbang du gyur pas 'du byed kyi nyes pa'i skyon ma mthong nas /
translated: That person, being dominated by desire, anger, and delusion, does not see the faults of the aggregates.

original: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnam par ma dag go /
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnam par ma dag go /
translated: His physical, verbal, and mental activities are impure.

original: gang zag de de ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnam par ma dag pas rnam par ma dag pa'i lam du ltung bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: gang zag de de ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnam par ma dag pas rnam par ma dag pa'i lam du ltung bar gyur pa ni /
translated: That person, because his physical, verbal, and mental activities are impure, falls into an impure path.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: That is to say,

original: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dvags so; ;ji ste skad cig tsam de las thar te lha dang / mir skyes na'ang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed la shin tu chags te 'du byed kyi phung po la rab tu chags so //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dvags so; ;ji ste skad cig tsam de las thar te lha dang / mir skyes na'ang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed la shin tu chags te 'du byed kyi phung po la rab tu chags so //
translated: he falls into the realms of hell-dwellers, animals, and hungry ghosts. If he escapes from that for a moment and is born as a god or human, he is attached to physical, verbal, and mental activities and is attached to the aggregate of the activities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs so //
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas realize it in this way, just as it is.

original: bdag cag kyang bus pa so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bslab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag cag kyang bus pa so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bslab par mi bya'o //
translated: We should not follow the example of foolish ordinary beings.

original: bdag cag gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnam par dag par sbyangs te 'du byed kyi phung po la chags par mi bya /
analyzed: bdag cag gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnam par dag par sbyangs te 'du byed kyi phung po la chags par mi bya /
translated: We should purify the formations of body, speech, and mind, and not be attached to the aggregate of formations.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po'i nyes pa'i skyon shin tu brtags te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po'i nyes pa'i skyon shin tu brtags te /
translated: We should thoroughly investigate the faults and problems of the aggregate of formations.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po las 'byung ba'i lam btsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po las 'byung ba'i lam btsal bar bya'o //
translated: We should seek the path that leads out of the aggregate of formations.

original: gang de ltar rtog pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed kyi phung po la rtog pa zhes bya ste /🔽de ni yang dag par 'du byed kyi phung po mi rtag pa @42a *//
analyzed: gang de ltar rtog pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed kyi phung po la rtog pa zhes bya ste / de ni yang dag par 'du byed kyi phung po mi rtag pa @42a *//
translated: One who contemplates in this way is said to contemplate the aggregate of formations just as it is.

original: la rtog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: la rtog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called correctly contemplating the impermanence of the aggregate of formations.

original: de'i tshe na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba dang / 'du byed kyi 'gog pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'gog pa'i lam la mi 'dzin /
analyzed: de'i tshe na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba dang / 'du byed kyi 'gog pa dang / 'du byed kyi 'gog pa'i lam la mi 'dzin /
translated: At that time, they do not grasp the formations, the arising of the formations, the cessation of the formations, or the path that leads to the cessation of the formations as they truly are.🔽

original: mi chags / mi zhen to //
analyzed: mi chags / mi zhen to //
translated: At that time, they do not grasp, do not cling to, and do not become attached to formations, the arising of formations, the cessation of formations, and the path to the cessation of formations as they truly are.

original: 'du byed rnams la'ang mi chags /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams la'ang mi chags /
translated: They do not become attached to formations,

original: mi zhen to //
analyzed: mi zhen to //
translated: and do not cling to them.

original: 'du byed kyi phung po la'ang mi chag so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po la'ang mi chag so //
translated: They do not become attached to the aggregate of formations,🔽and do not cling to it.

original: de ltar rtog pa'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang bral te 'du byed kyang 'du byed kyi phu po'i lam med par rtogs te /
analyzed: de ltar rtog pa'i tshe 'du byed kyi mtshan ma dang bral te 'du byed kyang 'du byed kyi phu po'i lam med par rtogs te /
translated: When they contemplate in this way, they are free from the signs of formations. They realize that formations are not the path of the aggregate of formations.

original: 'du byed thams cad la stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i 'du byed thams cad la skyo zhing skrag pa dang 'byung ba'i sems skye'o //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad la stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i 'du byed thams cad la skyo zhing skrag pa dang 'byung ba'i sems skye'o //
translated: They become disenchanted, alarmed, and disgusted with all formations, and they realize that all formations are emptiness.

original: rnam par dag pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed 'ba' zhig la mngon par 'du byed do //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed 'ba' zhig la mngon par 'du byed do //
translated: They only form pure formations of body, speech, and mind.

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma rnam par bshig pa dang / 'du byed kyi phung po'i mtshan ma las ring du gyur pas gang zag des ji tsam du lus thob par gyur pa de yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan ma rnam par bshig pa dang / 'du byed kyi phung po'i mtshan ma las ring du gyur pas gang zag des ji tsam du lus thob par gyur pa de yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: “The person who has destroyed the signs of formations and gone far from the signs of the aggregate of formations will have a body that is completely pure.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gang zag de ni lus kyi las rnam par dag /
analyzed: gang zag de ni lus kyi las rnam par dag /
translated: That person has a completely pure physical action,

original: ngag gi las rnam par dag /
analyzed: ngag gi las rnam par dag /
translated: a completely pure verbal action,

original: yid kyi las rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi las rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: and a completely pure mental action.

original: lus kyi 'du byed rnam par dag /
analyzed: lus kyi 'du byed rnam par dag /
translated: That person has completely pure physical formations,

original: ngag gi 'du byed rnam par dag /
analyzed: ngag gi 'du byed rnam par dag /
translated: completely pure verbal formations,

original: yid kyi 'du byed rnam par dag pa'o; ;gang zag de ni 'du byed kyi phung po dang bral ba /
analyzed: yid kyi 'du byed rnam par dag pa'o; ;gang zag de ni 'du byed kyi phung po dang bral ba /
translated: and completely pure mental formations. That person is free from the aggregate of formations,

original: 'du byed kyi phung po'i mtshan ma dang bral ba /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po'i mtshan ma dang bral ba /
translated: free from the signs of the aggregate of formations,

original: chos rnams kyi dngos po'i mtshan ma rnam par 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi dngos po'i mtshan ma rnam par 'jig pa'o //
translated: and has destroyed the signs of the entities of phenomena.

original: de ltar yang dag @42b pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i tshe 'du byed kyi phung po rnams gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
analyzed: de ltar yang dag @42b pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i tshe 'du byed kyi phung po rnams gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
translated: “When one thus correctly investigates, one will realize that the aggregate of formations does not come from anywhere

original: gang du'ang mi 'gro bar rtogs te /
analyzed: gang du'ang mi 'gro bar rtogs te /
translated: and does not go anywhere.

original: 'du byed rnams nges par skye ba'i mtshan ma 'am /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams nges par skye ba'i mtshan ma 'am /
translated: They do not observe any signs of the definite arising of formations,

original: nges par 'gog pa'i mtshan mar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nges par 'gog pa'i mtshan mar mi dmigs so //
translated: nor any signs of their definite cessation.

original: des 'du byed rnams la skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan ma med par rtogs te /
analyzed: des 'du byed rnams la skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan ma med par rtogs te /
translated: They understand that formations have no signs of arising or cessation.

original: 'du byed thams cad skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan ma ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan ma ma yin no //
translated: All formations are not signs of arising or cessation.

original: gang zag de 'du byed thams cad la skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan ma med par rtogs nas skyo zhing spong ba'i sems skyes te /
analyzed: gang zag de 'du byed thams cad la skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan ma med par rtogs nas skyo zhing spong ba'i sems skyes te /
translated: When that person understands that all formations have no signs of arising or cessation, a mind of weariness and abandonment arises.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed rnams kyi kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan ma rtogs shing chud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed rnams kyi kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan ma rtogs shing chud par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will understand and penetrate the signs of the arising and cessation of formations just as they are.

original: 'du byed rnams ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du rig kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid shin tu mi rtogs so //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du rig kyang 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid shin tu mi rtogs so //
translated: Although they know the characteristic of the non-arising of formations, they do not fully understand the characteristic of formations.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: 'du byed kyi phung po la nges pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi phung po la nges pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because the aggregate of formations has no definitive characteristic.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: chu shing la sra ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed /
analyzed: chu shing la sra ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed /
translated: The characteristics of solidity cannot be found in the plantain tree,🔽nor can the characteristics of non-solidity be found.

original: mi sra ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed pa de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed pa de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin te /
analyzed: mi sra ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed pa de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed pa de bzhin du 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin te /
translated: In the same way, the characteristics of conditioned [phenomena] cannot be found.🔽The characteristics of conditioned [phenomena] are like this:

original: sra ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed la mi sra ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed do //
analyzed: sra ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed la mi sra ba'i mtshan nyid kyang mi rnyed do //
translated: The characteristics of solidity cannot be found, nor can the characteristics of non-solidity be found.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'du byed kyi phung po la'ang 'jug pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'du byed kyi phung po la'ang 'jug pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa zhes bya'o //
translated: in this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas are said to contemplate the discernment of the mental activity that engages with the aggregate of mental formations.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: de @43a *// la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa zhe na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phung po ma yin pa la🔽rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtog /🔽phyin ci log gi phung po la rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtog /
analyzed: de @43a *// la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa zhe na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtog / phyin ci log gi phung po la rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtog /
translated: Bodhisattva mahāsattvas discern the aggregate of consciousness in that which is not an aggregate.🔽They discern the aggregate of consciousness in the aggregate of error.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phung po la rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtog go /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phung po la rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtog go /
translated: They discern the aggregate of consciousness in the aggregate of unreality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokapālas,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po de ni phyin ci log las skyes te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po de ni phyin ci log las skyes te /
translated: the aggregate of consciousness arises from error.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rkyen gyis bcings pas sngon gyi las kyis yod par gyur te /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rkyen gyis bcings pas sngon gyi las kyis yod par gyur te /
translated: It is bound by unreal conditions and comes into existence due to past karma.

original: da ltar gyi rkyen la rag lus pas rgyu dang / rkyen mang po la rag lus pa'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin pa ci'ang med pa'i rnam par brtags pa las rnam par shes pa las skyes so //
analyzed: da ltar gyi rkyen la rag lus pas rgyu dang / rkyen mang po la rag lus pa'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin pa ci'ang med pa'i rnam par brtags pa las rnam par shes pa las skyes so //
translated: Since it depends on present conditions, it is a cause. Since it depends on many conditions, it is a conceptual imputation. Consciousness arises from that.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Because of consciousness, it is called consciousness.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i blo 'khrul pa las bla thabs su yod par gyur te shes pa yod pas rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i blo 'khrul pa las bla thabs su yod par gyur te shes pa yod pas rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because of the deluded mind of conceptualization, it exists as a superimposition. Because there is consciousness, it is called consciousness.

original: dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs su shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs su shes pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it cognizes various things,

original: sems kyi las bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sems kyi las bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: because it generates mental activity,

original: bsams pa sems pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsams pa sems pa'i phyir /
translated: because it thinks what is thought,

original: rkyen mang po las mtshan ma skye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rkyen mang po las mtshan ma skye ba'i phyir /
translated: because signs arise from many conditions,

original: rnam pa sna tshogs su sems skye ba'i phyir na rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs su sems skye ba'i phyir na rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o //
translated: and because the mind arises in various ways, it is called the aggregate of consciousness.

original: shes pa las rnam par shes pa'i gzugs @43b byung ste sems kyi las ston pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes pa las rnam par shes pa'i gzugs @43b byung ste sems kyi las ston pa'i phyir /
translated: The form of consciousness arises from consciousness. Because it shows mental activity,

original: bsam pa sdug pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsam pa sdug pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the thought of what is thought,🔽and because it is the cause of the arising of consciousness, it is called the aggregate of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the aggregate of consciousness.

original: de la sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya ste /
analyzed: de la sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya ste /
translated: It is also called mind, thought, and consciousness.

original: thams cad kyang yid kyi las kyis rnam par rtog pas rnam par shes pas bsdus te mtshan nyid du rnam par shes /
analyzed: thams cad kyang yid kyi las kyis rnam par rtog pas rnam par shes pas bsdus te mtshan nyid du rnam par shes /
translated: Since all of these are included in consciousness, they are conceptualized by the mental faculty and discriminated by consciousness.

original: 'du byed du rnam par shes /
analyzed: 'du byed du rnam par shes /
translated: They are cognized as volitions,

original: rang bzhin du rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin du rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o //
translated: and cognized as natures. Therefore, they are called the aggregate of consciousness.

original: de ltar phung po ma yin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
analyzed: de ltar phung po ma yin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
translated: Thus, the aggregate of consciousness is not an aggregate.

original: ma skyes pa /
analyzed: ma skyes pa /
translated: It is unborn,

original: ma byung ba /
analyzed: ma byung ba /
translated: unoriginated,

original: ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: ma byas pa'o //
translated: and uncreated.

original: phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i rkyen gyis yang dag pa ma yin par shes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i rkyen gyis yang dag pa ma yin par shes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya'o //
translated: Because it is cognized by conditions that are associated with error and are not real, it is called the aggregate of consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po de ni rgyu dang / rkyen mang po las skyes te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po de ni rgyu dang / rkyen mang po las skyes te /
translated: Because that aggregate of consciousness arises from many causes and conditions.

original: rang bzhin dang / go rims dang / rgyun las skyes pa med de skad cig skad cig gis skye zhing 'gog ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang / go rims dang / rgyun las skyes pa med de skad cig skad cig gis skye zhing 'gog ste /
translated: It is not born from a nature, a sequence, or a continuum, but arises and ceases from moment to moment.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid bskyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid bskyed pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not the characteristic of the aggregate of consciousness that is produced.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i nges pa dmigs su med la skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i nges pa dmigs su med la skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The arising of consciousness is not observed, and the characteristic of arising is not observed.

original: nges pa dang / mtshan nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir /🔽ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nges pa dang / mtshan nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir / ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the certainty and the characteristic are not observed,🔽because there is no intrinsic nature,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir /
translated: because there is no individual characteristic,

original: sra ba'i rang bzhin mi rnyed pa'i phyir na mkhas pa dag ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste /
analyzed: sra ba'i rang bzhin mi rnyed pa'i phyir na mkhas pa dag ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste /
translated: because the nature of solidity is not found, the wise ones understand it as it really is.

original: phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por khong du chud do //
analyzed: phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por khong du chud do //
translated: They understand that the aggregate of consciousness is not an aggregate.

original: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag rnam @44a *//
analyzed: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag rnam @44a *//
translated: Childish ordinary beings,

original: par shes pa'i phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por 'du shes te log par rnam par rtog pa dang / phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i yang dag pa ma yin par rtog pa'i blos rnam par bcings pas rnam par shes pa'i phung por nan tan gyis brtags nas rnam par shes pa'i phung por chags /
analyzed: par shes pa'i phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por 'du shes te log par rnam par rtog pa dang / phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i yang dag pa ma yin par rtog pa'i blos rnam par bcings pas rnam par shes pa'i phung por nan tan gyis brtags nas rnam par shes pa'i phung por chags /
translated: They are bound by the mind that has mistaken thoughts and is mistaken, and they diligently investigate the aggregate of consciousness. They are attached to the aggregate of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i bya ba la gnas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bya ba la gnas /
translated: They abide in the activity of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa la brten te bsam pa'i sems pa bstan pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung po bskyed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa la brten te bsam pa'i sems pa bstan pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung po bskyed do //
translated: They generate the aggregate of consciousness in order to teach the mind that thinks in terms of the aspects of consciousness.

original: gang zag de rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par rtog pa'i nang gi rnam par shes pa la chags /
analyzed: gang zag de rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par rtog pa'i nang gi rnam par shes pa la chags /
translated: Those people are attached to the internal consciousness that has various thoughts.

original: phyi'i rnam par shes pa la chags /
analyzed: phyi'i rnam par shes pa la chags /
translated: They are attached to the external consciousness.

original: phyi nang gi rnam par shes pa la chags /🔽ring ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags /
analyzed: phyi nang gi rnam par shes pa la chags / ring ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags /
translated: They are attached to the internal and external consciousness.🔽They are attached to the distant consciousness.

original: nye ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags te /
analyzed: nye ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags te /
translated: They are attached to the near consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pas mtshan mar rnam par brtags pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po bskyed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas mtshan mar rnam par brtags pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po bskyed do //
translated: The consciousness aggregate is produced by the conceptualization of signs by consciousness.

original: gang zag de rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes kyis sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bla dvags su btags te /🔽'di ni sems so //
analyzed: gang zag de rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes kyis sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bla dvags su btags te / 'di ni sems so //
translated: The person is designated by the conceptualization of ideas as mind, thought, and consciousness.🔽This is mind.

original: 'di ni yid do //
analyzed: 'di ni yid do //
translated: This is thought.

original: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes nan tan gyis btags te /
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes nan tan gyis btags te /
translated: This is consciousness.

original: de ltar sems kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar shes so //
analyzed: de ltar sems kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar shes so //
translated: Thus, the various characteristics of mind are known to arise.

original: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag rnam par shes pa'i phung po la chags te rnam par shes pa'i phung pos rnam par bcings so //
analyzed: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag rnam par shes pa'i phung po la chags te rnam par shes pa'i phung pos rnam par bcings so //
translated: Childish ordinary beings are attached to the aggregate of consciousness and are bound by the aggregate of consciousness.

original: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes @44b pa 'dus pa las rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par shes pa'i phung por skyes so /
analyzed: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes @44b pa 'dus pa las rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par shes pa'i phung por skyes so /
translated: From the gathering of mind, thought, and consciousness, the aggregate of consciousness arises in various ways.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i dngos po'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i dngos po'i phyir /
translated: Because of the unreal conceptualization of ideas,

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir /
translated: because of the single characteristic,

original: nges pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir sems de dang / yid de dang / rnam par shes pa de thob cing tshogs pa rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nges pa'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir sems de dang / yid de dang / rnam par shes pa de thob cing tshogs pa rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the characteristics of mind, mentation, and consciousness are the same, they attain the skill in discerning the aggregates of consciousness.

original: gang zag de rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rten cing gnas te rnam par shes pa la chags pas 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po la yod par chags shing 'dzin to //
analyzed: gang zag de rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rten cing gnas te rnam par shes pa la chags pas 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po la yod par chags shing 'dzin to //
translated: “Those individuals rely on and abide in the aggregate of consciousness. Attached to consciousness, they are attached to and grasp the past aggregate of consciousness as existent.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'ang yod par 'dzin cing chags so //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'ang yod par 'dzin cing chags so //
translated: They are also attached to and grasp the future aggregate of consciousness as existent.

original: da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'ang yod par 'dzin cing chags so //
analyzed: da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'ang yod par 'dzin cing chags so //
translated: They are also attached to and grasp the present aggregate of consciousness as existent.

original: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / tshor ba dang / shes pa'i chos la rnam par shes pa'i phung por chags te yod par 'dzin to //
analyzed: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / tshor ba dang / shes pa'i chos la rnam par shes pa'i phung por chags te yod par 'dzin to //
translated: Childish ordinary beings are attached to and grasp the aggregate of consciousness as existent, in relation to phenomena that are seen, heard, felt, and known.”🔽“Mañjuśrī, what is the aggregate of form?

original: gang zag de mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / tshor ba dang / shes pa'i chos la chags shing 'dzin te /
analyzed: gang zag de mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / tshor ba dang / shes pa'i chos la chags shing 'dzin te /
translated: They are attached to and grasp at the phenomena of seeing, hearing, feeling, and knowing.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung pos rnam par bcings pas shes pa la gtso bor 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung pos rnam par bcings pas shes pa la gtso bor 'dzin to //
translated: Because they are bound by the aggregate of consciousness, they primarily grasp at consciousness.

original: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'dus pa'i dbang du gyur pas 'khor bar 'khor ba na /
analyzed: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'dus pa'i dbang du gyur pas 'khor bar 'khor ba na /
translated: They are controlled by the gathering of mind, thought, and consciousness, and so they circle in saṃsāra.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu /
translated: It is like this:🔽from this world to the next world,

original: 'jig rten pha rol nas 'di dag tu'o //🔽de dag kyang rnam par shes pa'i phung pos rnam par bcings pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes @45a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol nas 'di dag tu'o // de dag kyang rnam par shes pa'i phung pos rnam par bcings pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes @45a *//
translated: and from the next world back to this one.

original: pa'i phung por mi shes so //
analyzed: pa'i phung por mi shes so //
translated: Because they are bound by the aggregate of consciousness, they do not know the aggregate of consciousness as it really is.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yang dag pa'i ma yin na phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i rgyu las thos pa dang / mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / shes pa'i chos rnams byung ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yang dag pa'i ma yin na phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i rgyu las thos pa dang / mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / shes pa'i chos rnams byung ste /
translated: If the aggregate of consciousness is not real, then the phenomena of hearing, seeing, feeling, and knowing arise from a cause that is mistaken.

original: de la yang dag pa'i rnam par shes pa med do //
analyzed: de la yang dag pa'i rnam par shes pa med do //
translated: There is no true consciousness.

original: de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi rtogs pas na /
analyzed: de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi rtogs pas na /
translated: Since they do not understand reality as it is,

original: bar bar ni dge ba'i rnam par shes pa 'byung /
analyzed: bar bar ni dge ba'i rnam par shes pa 'byung /
translated: sometimes a wholesome consciousness arises,

original: bar bar ni mi dge ba'i rnam par shes pa 'byung /
analyzed: bar bar ni mi dge ba'i rnam par shes pa 'byung /
translated: sometimes an unwholesome consciousness arises,

original: bar bar ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: bar bar ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
translated: and sometimes a wholesome and unwholesome consciousness arises.

original: gang zag de rtag tu rnam par shes pa'i rjes su spyod kyang rnam par shes pa skye ba'i gnas mi shes /
analyzed: gang zag de rtag tu rnam par shes pa'i rjes su spyod kyang rnam par shes pa skye ba'i gnas mi shes /
translated: Although such people always follow consciousness, they do not know the basis for the arising of consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba'i mtshan nyid mi shes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa ji lta ba'i mtshan nyid mi shes so //
translated: nor do they know the true characteristics of consciousness.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa las byung bar rtogs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par shes pa las byung bar rtogs so //
translated: because bodhisattva mahāsattvas contemplate reality as it is, they understand that the aggregate of consciousness arises from unreal consciousness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / tshor ba dang / shes pa'i chos rnams rgyu dang / rkyen mang po las byung bar shes so //
analyzed: mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / tshor ba dang / shes pa'i chos rnams rgyu dang / rkyen mang po las byung bar shes so //
translated: They know that the phenomena of seeing, hearing, feeling, and knowing arise from many causes and conditions.

original: chos med pa las chos su 'du shes pas rnam par shes pa'i phung por chags par gyur to //
analyzed: chos med pa las chos su 'du shes pas rnam par shes pa'i phung por chags par gyur to //
translated: Because they perceive phenomena where there are no phenomena, they become attached to the aggregate of consciousness.

original: bdag cag gis bus pa so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bslab par mi bya yi /
analyzed: bdag cag gis bus pa so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bslab par mi bya yi /
translated: We should not follow the childish ordinary beings.

original: bdag cag gis rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'byed pa la @45b brtag pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po 'byed pa la brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag cag gis rnam par shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'byed pa la @45b brtag pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po 'byed pa la brtag par bya'o //
translated: We should investigate the discernment of consciousness as it truly is, and we should investigate the discernment of the aggregate of consciousness as it truly is.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa'i phung po de yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log par shes te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa'i phung po de yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log par shes te /
translated: When bodhisattvas investigate as it truly is, they know that the aggregate of consciousness is not real and is mistaken.

original: thog ma nas skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du shes so //
analyzed: thog ma nas skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du shes so //
translated: They know that it has the characteristic of arising from the beginning.

original: phung po ma yin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
analyzed: phung po ma yin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
translated: The aggregate that is not a real aggregate is the aggregate of consciousness.

original: gzugs brnyan gyi phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan gyi phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o //
translated: The aggregate that is a reflected image is the aggregate of consciousness.

original: sgyu ma'i phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste /
translated: The aggregate that is an illusion is the aggregate of consciousness.

original: dper na / sgyu ma mkhan gyis sgyu ma'i mi byas na mi de'i rnam par shes pa de ni nang na'ang mi gnas /
analyzed: dper na / sgyu ma mkhan gyis sgyu ma'i mi byas na mi de'i rnam par shes pa de ni nang na'ang mi gnas /
translated: For example, when a magician creates an illusory person, the consciousness of that person does not exist internally,

original: phyi rol na'ang mi gnas /
analyzed: phyi rol na'ang mi gnas /
translated: nor does it exist externally,

original: gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas pa ltar rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin kyang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i bar na'ang mi gnas pa ltar rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin kyang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: nor does it exist between the two. The nature of consciousness is also like that.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rkyen mang po dang / rnam par rtog pa las skyes te yang dag pa'i dngos po med do //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rkyen mang po dang / rnam par rtog pa las skyes te yang dag pa'i dngos po med do //
translated: It arises from many conditions that are not real and from conceptualization. It does not exist as a real thing.

original: 'khrul 'khor gyi mi ltar rnam par shes pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor gyi mi ltar rnam par shes pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: Consciousness is also like a mechanical doll.

original: phyin ci log dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rgyu rkyen mang po 'dus pa las yod par gyur to //
analyzed: phyin ci log dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rgyu rkyen mang po 'dus pa las yod par gyur to //
translated: It comes into being from the convergence of many causes and conditions that are false and inverted.

original: de ltar rtog pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / bdag med par shes so //
analyzed: de ltar rtog pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / mi gtsang ba dang / bdag med par shes so //
translated: When one understands in this way, one understands that consciousness is impermanent, painful, impure, and without self.

original: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin la sgyu ma lta bur rtogs so //
translated: The characteristics of consciousness are understood to be like an illusion, and the nature of consciousness is realized to be like an illusion.

original: byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'jig rten 'di @46a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'jig rten 'di @46a *//
translated: At that time, the bodhisattva thinks like this:

original: dag ni shin tu myos shing gti mug gis ldongs so //
analyzed: dag ni shin tu myos shing gti mug gis ldongs so //
translated: “These worlds are extremely confused and blinded by delusion.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa las 'jig rten 'byung ste /
analyzed: rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa las 'jig rten 'byung ste /
translated: The world arises from conceptual consciousness.

original: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pas na khams gsum 'di ni rnam par shes pa tsam mo //
analyzed: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pas na khams gsum 'di ni rnam par shes pa tsam mo //
translated: Because of the combination of mind, thought, and consciousness, this triple world is merely consciousness.

original: de ltar sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni gzugs med /🔽phyogs med / chos kyi nang na mi gnas /
analyzed: de ltar sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni gzugs med / phyogs med / chos kyi nang na mi gnas /
translated: Thus, mind, thought, and consciousness are formless,🔽directionless, not dwelling within phenomena,

original: chos kyi phyi rol na mi gnas so //
analyzed: chos kyi phyi rol na mi gnas so //
translated: and not dwelling outside phenomena.

original: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang ldan pas rnam par bcings pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung po la bdag dang / bdag gi bar 'dzin cing chags so //
analyzed: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang ldan pas rnam par bcings pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung po la bdag dang / bdag gi bar 'dzin cing chags so //
translated: Because they are bound by what is not real, ordinary people, who are like children, grasp the aggregate of consciousness as a self and as “mine” and are attached to it.

original: gang zag de ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po nang na gnas par 'dzin /
analyzed: gang zag de ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po nang na gnas par 'dzin /
translated: That person grasps the aggregate of consciousness as existing internally,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po phyi rol na gnas par 'dzin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po phyi rol na gnas par 'dzin /
translated: as existing externally,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po phyi nang gnyis ga na gnas par 'dzin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po phyi nang gnyis ga na gnas par 'dzin /
translated: as existing both internally and externally,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po de bdag dang / gzhan la gnas par 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po de bdag dang / gzhan la gnas par 'dzin to //
translated: and as existing in the self and in what belongs to the self.

original: gang zag de rnam par shes pa'i phung po la gtso bor 'dzin to //
analyzed: gang zag de rnam par shes pa'i phung po la gtso bor 'dzin to //
translated: That person grasps the aggregate of consciousness as primary.

original: rnam par shes pas rnam par bcings pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i ro la chags nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid gang brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pas rnam par bcings pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i ro la chags nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid gang brjod do //
translated: Because they are bound by consciousness, they are attached to the taste of the aggregate of consciousness and they proclaim the characteristics of the aggregate of consciousness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ro la chags pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po la chags shing 'dzin to //
analyzed: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ro la chags pas rnam par shes pa'i phung po la chags shing 'dzin to //
translated: They are attached to the taste of mind, thought, and consciousness, and thus they are attached to and grasp the aggregate of consciousness.

original: gang zag @46b de rnam par shes pas rnam par bcings te /
analyzed: gang zag @46b de rnam par shes pas rnam par bcings te /
translated: Those people are bound by consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po de dang 'brel bas sems dang / yid kyang rnam par shes pa'i dbang du gyur te sems dang / yid kyang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen gyis mthus bus pa so so'i skye bor skye ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po de dang 'brel bas sems dang / yid kyang rnam par shes pa'i dbang du gyur te sems dang / yid kyang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu dang / rkyen gyis mthus bus pa so so'i skye bor skye ste /
translated: Because they are connected to the aggregate of consciousness, mind and thought are also under the power of consciousness. Mind and thought are born as ordinary childish beings through the power of the causes and conditions of consciousness.

original: gal te bsam pa tha ma bskyed na lus tha ma thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te bsam pa tha ma bskyed na lus tha ma thob par 'gyur /
translated: If they give rise to the lowest intention, they will obtain the lowest body.

original: bsam pa mchog bskyed na lus mchog thob bo //
analyzed: bsam pa mchog bskyed na lus mchog thob bo //
translated: If they give rise to the highest intention, they will obtain the highest body.

original: bsam pa 'bring du bskyed na lus 'bring por thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsam pa 'bring du bskyed na lus 'bring por thob par 'gyur te /
translated: If they give rise to an intermediate intention, they will obtain an intermediate body.

original: gang zag de sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su spyod pa'i mthus skye mched rnams la rten cing gnas pa skyes par gyur to //
analyzed: gang zag de sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su spyod pa'i mthus skye mched rnams la rten cing gnas pa skyes par gyur to //
translated: Those people, through the power of following mind, thought, and consciousness, are born in dependence on the sense-spheres.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la chags pas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / yid blong ba dang / slos pa'i mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal las rnam par ma grol to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la chags pas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / yid blong ba dang / slos pa'i mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal las rnam par ma grol to //
translated: Because of attachment to the aggregate of consciousness, one is not liberated from birth, old age, sickness, death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress.

original: byang chub sems dpas de la da ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtogs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas de la da ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtogs te /
translated: Bodhisattvas now realize the aggregate of consciousness as it really is.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pas 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'ang mi chags mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs pas 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'ang mi chags mi 'dzin to //
translated: By realizing the characteristic of impermanence of the aggregate of consciousness as it really is, they are not attached to the past aggregate of consciousness, nor do they grasp at it.

original: phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por shes so //
analyzed: phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por shes so //
translated: They know that what is not an aggregate is the aggregate of consciousness.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'ang mi chags mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'ang mi chags mi 'dzin to //
translated: They are not attached to the future aggregate of consciousness, nor do they grasp at it.

original: phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por shes so //
analyzed: phung po ma yin pa la rnam par shes pa'i phung por shes so //
translated: They know that what is not an aggregate is the aggregate of consciousness.

original: da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa la'ang mi gnas te /
analyzed: da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa la'ang mi gnas te /
translated: They do not dwell on the present aggregate of consciousness.

original: @47a *// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid shes so //
analyzed: @47a *// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid shes so //
translated: He also knows the characteristic of impermanence of the aggregate of consciousness in accordance with reality.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i skye ba dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shes so //
translated: He knows the characteristic of arising and cessation of the aggregate of consciousness in accordance with reality.

original: gang de ltar yid la byed cing yang dag pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du'ang rnam par shes pa'i phung po de la rtog pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'i lam la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang de ltar yid la byed cing yang dag pa'i ji lta ba bzhin du'ang rnam par shes pa'i phung po de la rtog pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'i lam la 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
translated: When one thus contemplates and investigates the aggregate of consciousness in accordance with reality, it is called entering the path in accordance with reality.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa shes so //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa shes so //
translated: It is as follows:🔽He knows consciousness in accordance with reality.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba shes so //🔽yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'gog pa shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba shes so // yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'gog pa shes so //
translated: He knows the arising of consciousness in accordance with reality.🔽He knows the cessation of consciousness in accordance with reality.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'gog pa'i lam shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i 'gog pa'i lam shes so //
translated: He knows the path to the cessation of consciousness in accordance with reality.

original: gang zag de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po 'jog pa la mkhas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad yongs su gcod pa la mkhas par gyur to //
analyzed: gang zag de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po 'jog pa la mkhas pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad yongs su gcod pa la mkhas par gyur to //
translated: The person who understands the characteristics of the arising and cessation of the aggregate of consciousness, and who is skilled in positing the aggregate of consciousness, and who is skilled in eliminating all signs,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs so //
translated: knows the characteristics of the arising and cessation of the aggregate of consciousness, and understands the characteristics of the arising and cessation of the aggregate of consciousness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi skyed /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi skyed /
translated: At that time, the bodhisattva does not produce the aggregate of consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi 'gog ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po mi 'gog ste /
translated: nor does he stop the aggregate of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes @47b pa'i phung po de thog ma nas ma skyes par rtogs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes @47b pa'i phung po de thog ma nas ma skyes par rtogs so //
translated: He understands that the aggregate of consciousness is originally unborn.

original: de ltar rtogs pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa la 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par mi rtogs te /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa la 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par mi rtogs te /
translated: When he understands in this way, he does not conceptualize cessation as a characteristic of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du khong du chud do //
translated: They understand the aggregate of consciousness to be characterized by non-arising.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni skye ba med /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni skye ba med /
translated: the aggregate of consciousness is unborn,

original: mtshan ma med /
analyzed: mtshan ma med /
translated: without characteristics,

original: grub pa med do //
analyzed: grub pa med do //
translated: and without establishment.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa ma yin pas ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dus so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa ma yin pas ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dus so //
translated: The characteristics of the arising of the aggregate of consciousness are unreal, and so they are subsumed within the characteristic of non-arising.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ni skye ba dang grub pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ni skye ba dang grub pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: the aggregate of consciousness has no characteristics of arising or establishment.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid ni rgyu dang / rkyen mang po las skyes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid ni rgyu dang / rkyen mang po las skyes so //
translated: The characteristics of the aggregate of consciousness arise from many causes and conditions.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos la de ltar rtog pa ni phung po ma yin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtogs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos la de ltar rtog pa ni phung po ma yin pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung por rtogs so //
translated: when bodhisattva mahāsattvas contemplate the Dharma of dependent origination in this way, they realize that what is not an aggregate is the aggregate of consciousness.

original: mos pas rjes su rnam par 'byed cing brtags nas ji tsam du rnam par shes par brtags pa thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud cing rtogs so //
analyzed: mos pas rjes su rnam par 'byed cing brtags nas ji tsam du rnam par shes par brtags pa thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud cing rtogs so //
translated: With faith, they will discern and investigate, and to the extent that they investigate consciousness, they will understand and realize it all in accordance with reality.

original: byang chub sems dpas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i dben pa shes nas dmigs pa thams cad dang / shes par bya ba thams cad yongs su bcom mo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i dben pa shes nas dmigs pa thams cad dang / shes par bya ba thams cad yongs su bcom mo //
translated: “Bodhisattvas, having understood the emptiness of the aggregate of consciousness, will destroy all objects and all that is to be known.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po rtogs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po rtogs te /
translated: bodhisattva-mahāsattvas should thus understand the aggregate of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la skye ba med pa dang / ma byas pa @48a *//
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la skye ba med pa dang / ma byas pa @48a *//
translated: If they understand that the aggregate of consciousness is unborn, uncreated,

original: dang / ma byung ba dang / mi gzung ba dang / mi 'dzin par shes na de dag kyang rkyen mang po las skyes te /
analyzed: dang / ma byung ba dang / mi gzung ba dang / mi 'dzin par shes na de dag kyang rkyen mang po las skyes te /
translated: unoriginated, ungraspable, and ungrasped, then they will understand that it arises from many conditions.

original: rkyen mang po 'dus pa las yod par gyur to //
analyzed: rkyen mang po 'dus pa las yod par gyur to //
translated: It comes into existence through the convergence of many conditions.

original: mthong pa dang / thos pa dang / tshor ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi rkyen gyis yod par gyur te /
analyzed: mthong pa dang / thos pa dang / tshor ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos kyi rkyen gyis yod par gyur te /
translated: The conditions of phenomena that are seen, heard, felt, and cognized exist.

original: thog ma'i mtha' nas stong ngo //
analyzed: thog ma'i mtha' nas stong ngo //
translated: From the beginning, they are empty.

original: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rtog pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ma byas pa dang / ma byung bar shes te /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rtog pa'i tshe rnam par shes pa'i phung po la ma byas pa dang / ma byung bar shes te /
translated: When contemplating the aggregate of consciousness in this way, one will understand that the aggregate of consciousness is not created and does not arise.

original: gtso bor mi 'dzin mi chags so //
analyzed: gtso bor mi 'dzin mi chags so //
translated: One will not grasp at it as primary and will not be attached to it.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'jug pa la rtog go /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'jug pa la rtog go /
translated: Lokadhara,🔽bodhisattva-mahāsattvas thus discern and contemplate the aggregate of consciousness as it truly is.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang de ltar thabs mkhas pas phung po lnga la 'jug pa dang / de ltar thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la rtog pa ni phung po lnga ni kun 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang de ltar thabs mkhas pas phung po lnga la 'jug pa dang / de ltar thabs mkhas pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la rtog pa ni phung po lnga ni kun 'byung ba dang /
translated: Bodhisattvas who, with such skillful means, engage with the five aggregates and, with such skillful means, contemplate the five appropriated aggregates as they truly are, will understand that the five aggregates are the origin of suffering and will understand that the five aggregates are the cessation of suffering.

original: 'gog pa dang / lam la 'jug pa shin tu mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa dang / lam la 'jug pa shin tu mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
translated: He is said to be very skilled in entering into cessation and the path.

original: phung por mtshan mar 'dzin pa yongs su bcad pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phung po lnga'i thabs shes so //
analyzed: phung por mtshan mar 'dzin pa yongs su bcad pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du phung po lnga'i thabs shes so //
translated: By cutting off the grasping at the aggregates as signs, he knows the method of the five aggregates just as they are.

original: thabs des na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la mi chags /
analyzed: thabs des na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la mi chags /
translated: By that method, he does not become attached to the five appropriated aggregates.

original: mi 'dzin / mi zhe na /
analyzed: mi 'dzin / mi zhe na /
translated: He does not grasp at them, nor does he hate them.

original: 'ching par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ching par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not become bound.

original: yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs shes /
analyzed: yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs shes /
translated: He knows form just as it is.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan @48b nyid shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan @48b nyid shes so //
translated: He knows the characteristic of impermanence of form just as it is.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs la chags pa 'byung na de ma thag tu sel cing gcod do //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpas gzugs la chags pa 'byung na de ma thag tu sel cing gcod do //
translated: Thus, when attachment to form arises, the bodhisattva immediately eliminates and cuts it off.

original: de bzhin du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shes te /
translated: In the same way, he knows feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness just as they are.

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang shes so //
translated: They also know the characteristics of the impermanence of feelings, perceptions, compositional factors, and consciousness.

original: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la chags pa 'byung na de ma thag tu sel cing gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la chags pa 'byung na de ma thag tu sel cing gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If attachment to feelings, perceptions, compositional factors, and consciousness arises, they immediately eliminate and cut it off.

original: byang chub sems dpa' nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la 'dod cing chags pa yongs su bcad pas nges pa'i phung po lnga'i thabs khong du chud pa'i rjes su 'jug go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la 'dod cing chags pa yongs su bcad pas nges pa'i phung po lnga'i thabs khong du chud pa'i rjes su 'jug go /
translated: Bodhisattvas, by eliminating attachment and desire for the five appropriated aggregates, follow the method of penetrating the five definitive aggregates.

original: de ltar rtog pa'i tshe nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan ma phra mo la'ang mkhas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rtog pa'i tshe nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan ma phra mo la'ang mkhas par 'gyur ro //
translated: When they contemplate in this way, they become skilled in the subtle characteristics of the arising and cessation of the five appropriated aggregates.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan ma shin tu phra ba rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan ma shin tu phra ba rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa zhe na /
translated: “What, you may wonder, does it mean for bodhisattva great beings to investigate the discernment of the subtle characteristics of the arising and cessation of the five appropriated aggregates?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can thog ma mang la du zhugs nas nur nur por gyur pa na lnga phung lnga ma 'gags nas phung po lnga gzhan zhig skyes te /🔽de nas phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs te rnam par shes pa snga ma 'gags mod kyi phung po lnga la chad pa'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can thog ma mang la du zhugs nas nur nur por gyur pa na lnga phung lnga ma 'gags nas phung po lnga gzhan zhig skyes te / de nas phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs te rnam par shes pa snga ma 'gags mod kyi phung po lnga la chad pa'am /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings observe sentient beings who have entered the womb and become an embryo, they know that the five aggregates do not cease and that another set of five aggregates arises.

original: @49a *// 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin par shes so //
analyzed: @49a *// 'gag pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin par shes so //
translated: They understand the characteristics of the arising and cessation of the five aggregates and know that the previous consciousness has ceased, but that the five aggregates are not characterized by annihilation or cessation.

original: rnam par shes pa nur nur po la rten cing gnas mod kyi phung po lnga la mi gnas pa dang / mi rtag pa nyid du shes so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nur nur po la rten cing gnas mod kyi phung po lnga la mi gnas pa dang / mi rtag pa nyid du shes so //
translated: They know that the consciousness is supported and based on the embryo, but that the five aggregates are not based on it and are impermanent.

original: de ltar thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i skad cig ma'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga skye zhing 'gog pa dang / nur nur po nas mngon par 'byung ba'i bar dang / skyes nas 'chi ba'i bar du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'di skad cig skad cig cing skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid du rtogs so //
analyzed: de ltar thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i skad cig ma'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga skye zhing 'gog pa dang / nur nur po nas mngon par 'byung ba'i bar dang / skyes nas 'chi ba'i bar du nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'di skad cig skad cig cing skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid du rtogs so //
translated: from the time of the kalala until the time of emerging, and from birth until death, are realized to have the characteristic of arising and ceasing in every moment.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni skad cig thang cig gis skye zhing 'gog pa yin te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni skad cig thang cig gis skye zhing 'gog pa yin te /
translated: The five appropriated aggregates arise and cease in a single instant.

original: de ltar na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra ba rnam par 'byed pa rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra ba rnam par 'byed pa rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, this is called the realization of the discernment of the extremely subtle characteristics of the arising and ceasing of the five appropriated aggregates.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra ba ni /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra ba ni /
translated: the extremely subtle characteristics of the arising and ceasing of the five appropriated aggregates

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: are as follows.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga snga ma 'gags nas dngos po ci'ang med par mngal du 'gro ste /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga snga ma 'gags nas dngos po ci'ang med par mngal du 'gro ste /
translated: The five appropriated aggregates cease in the womb, and nothing comes into existence.

original: thog ma rnam par shes pa dang 'byor ba de'i tshe na phung po lnga la skye zhing 'gog pa yod do //
analyzed: thog ma rnam par shes pa dang 'byor ba de'i tshe na phung po lnga la skye zhing 'gog pa yod do //
translated: When the consciousness first comes into contact with the womb, the five aggregates arise and cease.

original: nur nur po la brten nas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bla dvags su mi zhes btags par gyur to //
analyzed: nur nur po la brten nas nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la bla dvags su mi zhes btags par gyur to //
translated: Based on the embryo, the five appropriated aggregates are designated as a person.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rten med na gnas par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rten med na gnas par mi 'gyur te /
translated: if there is no basis for consciousness, it will not remain.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni rnam par shes pa la rten ces bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni rnam par shes pa la rten ces bya'o //
translated: The five appropriated aggregates are said to be the basis for consciousness.

original: @49b 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: @49b 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi nye bar len pa'i phung po skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra ba'ang gzhung de bzhin shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi nye bar len pa'i phung po skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra ba'ang gzhung de bzhin shes par bya'o //
translated: you should understand that the arising and cessation of the five appropriated aggregates in the formless realm is also characterized by subtle arising and cessation.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra mo rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyis kyang shes par mi nus na nyan thos kyi shes rab kyis shes pa lta ci smos te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra mo rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab kyis kyang shes par mi nus na nyan thos kyi shes rab kyis shes pa lta ci smos te /
translated: The characteristics of the arising and cessation of the subtle appropriated aggregates cannot be known even by the wisdom of the pratyekabuddhas, let alone by the wisdom of the śrāvakas.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyag cig gis ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga thog ma mngal du 'jug pa'i bar gyi skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra mo dang / gzugs med pa'i lha'i phung po skad cig thang cig gis skye zhing 'gog pa legs par mkhyen to //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyag cig gis ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga thog ma mngal du 'jug pa'i bar gyi skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra mo dang / gzugs med pa'i lha'i phung po skad cig thang cig gis skye zhing 'gog pa legs par mkhyen to // 'di lta ste /
translated: Only the Bhagavān Buddha knows well the characteristics of the arising and cessation of the five appropriated aggregates from the beginning, when entering the womb, and the arising and cessation of the formless gods in an instant.

original: mkhyen pa'i shes rab thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi shes rab las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mkhyen pa'i shes rab thams cad 'jig rten thams cad kyi shes rab las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all the wisdoms of the Buddha transcend the wisdoms of all worldly beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma skyes pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul la zhugs pa des kyang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga shin tu phra ba'i mtshan nyid thog ma mngal du 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma skyes pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul la zhugs pa des kyang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga shin tu phra ba'i mtshan nyid thog ma mngal du 'jug pa dang /
translated: Even a bodhisattva-mahāsattva who has attained acceptance of the nonarising of phenomena and entered the domain of the Buddha’s wisdom does not fully understand the subtle characteristics of the five appropriated aggregates from the beginning of entering the womb,

original: gzugs med pa'i lha dag la sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa dang 'dra bar rdzogs par mi shes so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i lha dag la sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa dang 'dra bar rdzogs par mi shes so //
translated: or the formless gods, in the same way that the Buddha understands them.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gzhan gyi rjes su ltos pa'i shes rab mi mnga' ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gzhan gyi rjes su ltos pa'i shes rab mi mnga' ste /
translated: the Bhagavān Buddha does not have wisdom that depends on others.

original: rang bzhin gyis ye shes dang / shes rab dang / thabs mkhas pa brnyes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par @50a *//🔽sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ye shes dang / shes rab dang / thabs mkhas pa brnyes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par @50a *// sangs rgyas so //
translated: Because he has attained wisdom, insight, and skillful means by nature, he has fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyis ni mi chud pa med de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyis ni mi chud pa med de /
translated: There is nothing that is not understood by the Buddha’s wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad la nges pa'i shes rab brnyes te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad la nges pa'i shes rab brnyes te /
translated: The Bhagavān has attained definitive wisdom in all dharmas through unobstructed wisdom.

original: chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa'i mthu'ang brnyes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad dbang du gyur pa'i mthu'ang brnyes so //
translated: He has also attained the power of mastery over all dharmas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: bskal pa tshad med /
analyzed: bskal pa tshad med /
translated: It is because for immeasurable,

original: dpag tu med /
analyzed: dpag tu med /
translated: incalculable,

original: grangs med pa brgya stong snyed kyi bar du shin tu zab mo'i chos mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grangs med pa brgya stong snyed kyi bar du shin tu zab mo'i chos mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: hundreds of thousands of eons he has engaged in the practice of the profound Dharma.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la rtog pa'i thabs kyang med na /
analyzed: bus pa so so'i skye bo dag ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la rtog pa'i thabs kyang med na /
translated: if ordinary foolish beings do not even have the means to contemplate the five appropriated aggregates,

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra mo la rtog nus pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i skye zhing 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu phra mo la rtog nus pa lta ci smos /
