analyzed: nges pa'i mtshan nyid med pas gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
translated: It has no definitive characteristic, and so it is called the characteristic of form.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bdag med pa'i phyir gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bdag med pa'i phyir gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
translated: The characteristic of form is called the characteristic of form because it is devoid of self.

original: sems can gyi rjes su ji lta ji lta ba de ltar de bzhin du shes pa'i phyir gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi rjes su ji lta ji lta ba de ltar de bzhin du shes pa'i phyir gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
translated: The characteristic of form is called the characteristic of form because it is understood in accordance with the way sentient beings are.

original: gang su zhig gzugs kyi mtshan nyid shes na gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang shes so //🔽gzugs kyi mtshan @60b nyid lam skyes pa'i khams su shes na /🔽gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la ma byas pa'i khams su shes so //
analyzed: gang su zhig gzugs kyi mtshan nyid shes na gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang shes so // gzugs kyi mtshan @60b nyid lam skyes pa'i khams su shes na / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la ma byas pa'i khams su shes so //
translated: one knows the characteristics of form to be the element of non-action.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?🔽The characteristics of form are not past,🔽not future, and not present.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de 'das pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de 'das pa ma yin /
translated: The characteristics of form are not real,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma yin; da ltar gyi ma yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma yin; da ltar gyi ma yin /
translated: not unreal, and not both real and unreal.

original: mtshan nyid ci'ang med pa bstan pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ci'ang med pa bstan pa /
translated: The characteristics of form are not existent,🔽not non-existent, and not both existent and non-existent.🔽The characteristics of form are not to be demonstrated,🔽not to be shown, and not to be taught.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa bla dvags su btags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa bla dvags su btags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
translated: The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of form,🔽not the characteristics of the eye, and not the characteristics of the mind.

original: de dag ni gzugs kyi khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de dag ni gzugs kyi khams zhes bya'o //
translated: The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the element of earth,🔽not the characteristics of the element of water,🔽not the characteristics of the element of fire,🔽and not the characteristics of the element of wind.🔽The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the element of space,🔽not the characteristics of the element of consciousness,🔽and not the characteristics of the element of mental objects.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi khams rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzugs kyi khams rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa ste /
translated: The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the eye,🔽not the characteristics of the ear,🔽not the characteristics of the nose,🔽and not the characteristics of the tongue.🔽The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the body,🔽and not the characteristics of the mind.🔽The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of form,🔽not the characteristics of sound,🔽not the characteristics of smell,🔽and not the characteristics of taste.🔽The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of touch,🔽and not the characteristics of mental objects.🔽The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the eye,🔽not the characteristics of the form element,🔽and not the characteristics of the eye consciousness element.

original: byang chub sems dpas de nas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par 'byed pa la rtog go /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas de nas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par 'byed pa la rtog go /
translated: The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the ear,🔽not the characteristics of the sound element,🔽and not the characteristics of the ear consciousness element.🔽The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the nose,🔽not the characteristics of the smell element,🔽and not the characteristics of the nose consciousness element.🔽The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the tongue,🔽not the characteristics of the taste element,🔽and not the characteristics of the tongue consciousness element.🔽The characteristics of form are not the characteristics of the body,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: not the characteristics of the

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa med /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la mig gi rnam par shes pa med /
translated: In the eye consciousness there is no eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med /
translated: In the eye-consciousness element there is no eye-consciousness element.

original: rtag pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: rtag pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: There is no characteristic of permanence.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la dngos po med /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la dngos po med /
translated: In the eye-consciousness element there is no entity.

original: nges pa'i chos med do //
analyzed: nges pa'i chos med do //
translated: There is no definite dharma.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bstan du med pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bstan du med pa'o //
translated: The eye-consciousness element is not something that can be shown.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni 'dus pa ma yin gyes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni 'dus pa ma yin gyes pa ma yin te /
translated: The eye-consciousness element is not a composite, not a separation,

original: dngos po'i rtsa ba med do //
analyzed: dngos po'i rtsa ba med do //
translated: and has no root of an entity.

original: de'ang sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang / da ltar gyi rkyen dang / gzugs la rag lus pa'i phyir 'di rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'ang sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang / rkyen dang / da ltar gyi rkyen dang / gzugs la rag lus pa'i phyir 'di rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
translated: Moreover, because it depends on the causes and conditions of past karma and on present conditions and form, it is called the consciousness element.

original: bus pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log gi sems kyi rjes su song bas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //🔽de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni khams med par khong @61a *//
analyzed: bus pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log gi sems kyi rjes su song bas mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o // de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni khams med par khong @61a *//
translated: Because childish ordinary beings follow a mind that is mistaken, it is called the eye-consciousness element.

original: du chud cing rtogs so //
analyzed: du chud cing rtogs so //
translated: In that regard, the noble ones understand and realize that there is no element.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the eye consciousness element is not fixed.

original: de ni rkyen rnams las skyes te /
analyzed: de ni rkyen rnams las skyes te /
translated: It is born from conditions,

original: rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
translated: and because it depends on conditions, it is called the eye consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul gyi gnas ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul gyi gnas ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
translated: The basis of the domain of consciousness is called the eye consciousness element.

original: de ltar nges pa med pa'i phyir na nges pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar nges pa med pa'i phyir na nges pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
translated: Because it is not fixed in this way, it is explained as having the characteristic of non-fixation.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is unborn,

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is taught to be unreal,🔽because it is imagined as the mark of form,

original: gzugs kyi mtshan mar rnam par brtag pa'i phyir; rkyen rnams bstan pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bshad do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan mar rnam par brtag pa'i phyir; rkyen rnams bstan pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bshad do //
translated: and because it is taught as a condition, it is explained as the eye consciousness element.

original: sems can dag /
analyzed: sems can dag /
translated: Sentient beings,

original: ji ltar shes pa'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pas thabs kyis rnam par phye ste /
analyzed: ji ltar shes pa'i rjes su de bzhin gshegs pas thabs kyis rnam par phye ste /
translated: the Tathāgata has explained it with skillful means in accordance with their understanding.

original: cha gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid gzhom pa'i phyir de lta bu'i mtshan nyid bshad do //
analyzed: cha gcig pa dang / tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid gzhom pa'i phyir de lta bu'i mtshan nyid bshad do //
translated: The characteristics of sameness and difference are destroyed.

original: rnam par shes pa la nges pa'i mtshan nyid med de mig gi dbang po rnam par dag pas gzugs kyi mtshan nyid shes te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la nges pa'i mtshan nyid med de mig gi dbang po rnam par dag pas gzugs kyi mtshan nyid shes te /
translated: Consciousness has no fixed characteristics. Because the eye faculty is pure, it knows the characteristics of form.

original: chos gnyis 'dus pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bshad do //
analyzed: chos gnyis 'dus pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bshad do //
translated: Because two dharmas come together, it is explained as the eye consciousness element.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bshad do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bshad do //
translated: In order to explain the true characteristics of eye consciousness, it is explained as the eye consciousness element.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mig gi spyod yul gyi gnas te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mig gi spyod yul gyi gnas te /
translated: The eye consciousness element is the abode of the eye's domain.

original: @61b gzugs su rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de'ang khams med par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: @61b gzugs su rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de'ang khams med par bshad pa'o //
translated: Consciousness of form is the eye consciousness element. That is also explained as the absence of elements.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mkhas pa dag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs su med de /
analyzed: mkhas pa dag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs su med de /
translated: The wise do not observe the eye consciousness element as the eye consciousness element.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs su med pas dngos por mi rnyed do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs su med pas dngos por mi rnyed do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: The eye-consciousness element is not found as a thing, because the eye-consciousness element is not apprehended as the eye-consciousness element. And why?

original: nges pa'i mtshan nyid med pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: nges pa'i mtshan nyid med pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: The eye-consciousness element has no defining characteristic.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni btags pa tsam du zad do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni btags pa tsam du zad do //
translated: The eye-consciousness element is just a conceptual designation.

original: khams zhes bshad pa de'ang mi len pa'i don bshad par zad do //
analyzed: khams zhes bshad pa de'ang mi len pa'i don bshad par zad do //
translated: The meaning of ‘element’ is explained as non-appropriation.

original: mthong bar bya ba'i gnas yod pas mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi las las mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid skyes pas mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mthong bar bya ba'i gnas yod pas mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi las las mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid skyes pas mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because there is a basis of seeing, and because the eye-consciousness arises from the eye and the mental activity, it is called ‘eye-consciousness.’

original: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / dngos po gsum 'dus pa las rkyen rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes te de ni khams kyi don las dben pa'o //
analyzed: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / dngos po gsum 'dus pa las rkyen rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes te de ni khams kyi don las dben pa'o //
translated: From the coming together of the three—the eye element, the form element, and the eye-consciousness element—the characteristic of the conditions is known. That is the meaning of ‘element.’

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam grangs de snyed kyis na sems can rnams yang dag pa'i lam la 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam grangs de snyed kyis na sems can rnams yang dag pa'i lam la 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: “The realms of the eye, the realms of form, and the realms of visual consciousness are taught by the Tathāgata as the method of discerning, seeing, and understanding characteristics.

original: 'di la yang dag par na mig gi khams med /
analyzed: 'di la yang dag par na mig gi khams med /
translated: In reality, there are no realms of the eye,

original: gzugs kyi khams med /🔽mig gi rnam par shes @62a *//
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams med / mig gi rnam par shes @62a *//
translated: no realms of form,

original: pa'i khams med de /
analyzed: pa'i khams med de /
translated: and no realms of visual consciousness.🔽The Tathāgata has taught the characteristics of the realms as a method of discerning, seeing, and understanding.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mtshan nyid rnams shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa'i thabs su gsungs te; mtshan nyid gsungs pa 'di la gang zag su zhig chud cing rtogs na khams gsum po la khams med par shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mtshan nyid rnams shes pa dang / mthong ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa'i thabs su gsungs te; mtshan nyid gsungs pa 'di la gang zag su zhig chud cing rtogs na khams gsum po la khams med par shes so //
translated: If a person understands and realizes this teaching of the characteristics, he will know that the three realms are not realms.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir khams rnams la mtshan nyid du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir khams rnams la mtshan nyid du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the realms do not have the characteristics of realms, and the characteristics of the realms cannot be apprehended.”

original: rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
translated: The ear element, the sound element, and the ear consciousness element; the nose element, the smell element, and the nose consciousness element; the tongue element, the taste element, and the tongue consciousness element;

original: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhung 'dis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhung 'dis shes par bya'o //
translated: the body element, the touch element, and the body consciousness element should be understood in the same way.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yid kyi khams rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yid kyi khams rnam par 'byed pa la rtog pa zhe na /
translated: how do bodhisattva mahāsattvas contemplate the discernment of the mind element?

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du yid kyi khams la dngos po ci'ang med pa'i phyir nges pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du yid kyi khams la dngos po ci'ang med pa'i phyir nges pa'i mtshan nyid med do //
translated: Bodhisattvas think, ‘Because the mind element has no substance, it has no definitive characteristic.

original: yid kyi khams la yid kyi khams zhes bya ba med /
analyzed: yid kyi khams la yid kyi khams zhes bya ba med /
translated: The mind element is not called the mind element.

original: nges pa'i khams med do //
analyzed: nges pa'i khams med do //
translated: It is not a definitive element.

original: yid kyi khams zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yid kyi khams zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The so-called mind element

original: dper na / sa bon sa chen po la rmos nas ser gyis rlan te nye  mas dros @62b par byas shing rlung gis bskyod na myu gu bags kyis 'byung ste /
analyzed: dper na / sa bon sa chen po la rmos nas ser gyis rlan te nye  mas dros @62b par byas shing rlung gis bskyod na myu gu bags kyis 'byung ste /
translated: For example, when a seed is planted in the great earth, it is moistened by water, warmed by fire, and stirred by wind, and the sprout gradually emerges.

original: myu gu'ang sa bon las ma skyes la /
analyzed: myu gu'ang sa bon las ma skyes la /
translated: The sprout is not produced from the seed.

original: sa bon yang myu gu dang gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sa bon yang myu gu dang gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: The seed is not the same as the sprout.

original: myu gu skyes nas sa bon yang 'jig ste /
analyzed: myu gu skyes nas sa bon yang 'jig ste /
translated: When the sprout is produced, the seed is destroyed.

original: sa bon yang myu gu las gzhan ma yin la myu gu'ang sa bon las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: sa bon yang myu gu las gzhan ma yin la myu gu'ang sa bon las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: The seed is not different from the sprout, and the sprout is not different from the seed.

original: myu gu'i nang nas sa bon med pa bzhin yid kyi khams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: myu gu'i nang nas sa bon med pa bzhin yid kyi khams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: Just as the seed does not exist within the sprout, the same is true of the mind element.

original: yid kyi las skyed pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshon pas ni sa bon gyis myu gu mtshon pa bzhin te /
analyzed: yid kyi las skyed pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshon pas ni sa bon gyis myu gu mtshon pa bzhin te /
translated: Because it produces mental activity, it is indicated by the term “mind consciousness,” just as a sprout is indicated by the term “seed.”

original: yid kyi khams zhes btags so //
analyzed: yid kyi khams zhes btags so //
translated: It is designated as the “mind element.”🔽Apart from the mind element, there is no mind or mind element.

original: yid kyi khams las gud na yid dang / yid kyi khams zhes bya ba med; yid du mi shes kyang bla dvags su yid kyi khams zhes btags so //
analyzed: yid kyi khams las gud na yid dang / yid kyi khams zhes bya ba med; yid du mi shes kyang bla dvags su yid kyi khams zhes btags so //
translated: Although the mind is not cognized, it is designated as the “mind element.”

original: yid kyi khams zhes bya ba de yid kyi nang na mi gnas /
analyzed: yid kyi khams zhes bya ba de yid kyi nang na mi gnas /
translated: The so-called mental element does not exist within the mind.

original: yid kyi phyi rol na'ang mi gnas /
analyzed: yid kyi phyi rol na'ang mi gnas /
translated: It does not exist outside the mind.

original: gnyis ka'i bar na mi gnas te /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i bar na mi gnas te /
translated: It does not exist between them.

original: sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang / rkyen gyi phyir /
analyzed: sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang / rkyen gyi phyir /
translated: It is because of the causes and conditions of past karma.

original: rnam par shes pas bskyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par shes pas bskyed pa'i phyir /
translated: It is because of the generation of consciousness.

original: yid kyi las kyi phyir /
analyzed: yid kyi las kyi phyir /
translated: It is because of mental activity.

original: dmigs par bya ba shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dmigs par bya ba shes pa'i phyir /
translated: It is because of the cognition of the object.

original: mtshan nyid du btags pa 'dus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mtshan nyid du btags pa 'dus pa'i phyir /
translated: It is because of the characteristics of the aggregation.

original: da ltar gyi dmigs pa skye ba'i phyir yid kyi khams zhes bya ste /
analyzed: da ltar gyi dmigs pa skye ba'i phyir yid kyi khams zhes bya ste /
translated: It is because of the arising of the present object. It is called the mental element.

original: de ni ma nges pa'i yid kyi las kyi mtshan nyid dang / rgyu dang / rkyen mang po 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de ni ma nges pa'i yid kyi las kyi mtshan nyid dang / rgyu dang / rkyen mang po 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the characteristic of the indeterminate mental activity, and the characteristic of the aggregation of many causes and conditions.

original: yid kyi khams ni mang po'i 'dus pa las skye bas sems can ji ltar shes pa'i rjes su 'jug go /
analyzed: yid kyi khams ni mang po'i 'dus pa las skye bas sems can ji ltar shes pa'i rjes su 'jug go /
translated: The mental element arises from the aggregation of many things and follows the cognition of sentient beings.

original: don dam pa la ni yid kyi khams zhes bya ba med do //
analyzed: don dam pa la ni yid kyi khams zhes bya ba med do //
translated: In the ultimate sense, there is no so-called mental element.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: dngos po med pa'i @63a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i @63a *//
translated: Because it is a non-entity.

original: phyir ro // mi skye ba ni yid kyi khams te skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir ro // mi skye ba ni yid kyi khams te skye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The unarisen is the mind element, because it is non-arisen.

original: yid kyi khams zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob tu btags pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: yid kyi khams zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob tu btags pa'i tshig yin te /
translated: The so-called mind element is a term for a conventional designation.

original: don dam par na ngos par yid kyi khams med do //
analyzed: don dam par na ngos par yid kyi khams med do //
translated: In the ultimate sense, the mind element does not exist.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dmigs su med do //
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dmigs su med do //
translated: The past, future, and present are not apprehended.

original: khams dag ni khams med pa la yid kyi khams su rtogs so //
analyzed: khams dag ni khams med pa la yid kyi khams su rtogs so //
translated: The elements are realized as the mind element in the absence of elements.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi khams la 'byed cing rtogs pa ni khams med pa la chos kyi khams su rtogs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi khams la 'byed cing rtogs pa ni khams med pa la chos kyi khams su rtogs te /
translated: Bodhisattvas discern and realize the phenomena element as the realization of the phenomena element in the absence of elements.

original: chos kyi khams la rang bzhin med pas rang bzhin nyid dmigs su med de /
analyzed: chos kyi khams la rang bzhin med pas rang bzhin nyid dmigs su med de /
translated: Since the phenomena element has no intrinsic nature, its intrinsic nature is not apprehended.

original: nges pa med pa'i khams ni chos kyi khams so //
analyzed: nges pa med pa'i khams ni chos kyi khams so //
translated: The indeterminate element is the phenomena element.

original: chos kyi khams ni dngos por dmigs su med pa'i phyir nges pa'i dngos por dmigs su med de /
analyzed: chos kyi khams ni dngos por dmigs su med pa'i phyir nges pa'i dngos por dmigs su med de /
translated: The phenomena element is not apprehended as a determinate entity because it is not apprehended as an entity.

original: skye bo phyin ci log tu lta zhing yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par bcings pa dag shes par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes brjod cing bshad pa'ang so so'i skye bo dag khams med pa la dgod pa'i phyir chos kyi khams bshad do //
analyzed: skye bo phyin ci log tu lta zhing yang dag pa ma yin pas rnam par bcings pa dag shes par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes brjod cing bshad pa'ang so so'i skye bo dag khams med pa la dgod pa'i phyir chos kyi khams bshad do //
translated: The Dharma element is taught and explained in order to make known to people who have false views and are bound by what is not true that the Dharma element is taught in order to establish ordinary people in the absence of elements.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos kyi khams la chos kyi khams med do //
analyzed: chos kyi khams la chos kyi khams med do //
translated: The Dharma element does not exist in the Dharma element.

original: chos kyi khams zhes bya ba ni rkyen mang po 'dus pa las skyes so //
analyzed: chos kyi khams zhes bya ba ni rkyen mang po 'dus pa las skyes so //
translated: The so-called Dharma element arises from the coming together of many conditions.

original: rkyen 'dus pa las skyes pa'i chos la ni rang bzhin med do //
analyzed: rkyen 'dus pa las skyes pa'i chos la ni rang bzhin med do //
translated: A Dharma that arises from the coming together of conditions has no intrinsic nature.

original: rgyu dang / rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because causes and conditions have no intrinsic nature,

original: rgyu dang / rkyen ni mang po 'dus pa'i phyir ci log gi rgyun las skyes so //
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen ni mang po 'dus pa'i phyir ci log gi rgyun las skyes so //
translated: causes and conditions arise from the continuity of error because of the coming together of many things.

original: de bzhin gshegs @63b pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi tshig tu brjod pas khams med pa'i chos bstan pa'i phyi chos kyi khams gsungs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs @63b pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi tshig tu brjod pas khams med pa'i chos bstan pa'i phyi chos kyi khams gsungs so //
translated: The Tathagata, in order to ripen sentient beings, has taught the dharmadhatu by means of conventional expressions, saying: “There is no element of dharmas.”

original: chos kyi khams ni nang na mi gnas /
analyzed: chos kyi khams ni nang na mi gnas /
translated: The dharmadhatu does not exist internally,

original: phyi rol na mi gnas /
analyzed: phyi rol na mi gnas /
translated: does not exist externally,

original: gnyis ka'i bar na mi gnas kyang so so'i skye bo dag dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos shes shing mthong ngo //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i bar na mi gnas kyang so so'i skye bo dag dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos shes shing mthong ngo //
translated: and does not exist in between. Nevertheless, ordinary people know and see wholesome and unwholesome dharmas.

original: chos kyi khams kyis chos thams cad shes pa dang / mthong ba med par bshad pa ni mthar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mthar stong pa nyid du bshad pa ni chos kyi khams yin no //
analyzed: chos kyi khams kyis chos thams cad shes pa dang / mthong ba med par bshad pa ni mthar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mthar stong pa nyid du bshad pa ni chos kyi khams yin no //
translated: The explanation that the dharmadhatu is taught as the emptiness of the ultimate because it is the emptiness of the ultimate, which is the characteristic of the emptiness of the ultimate, is the dharmadhatu.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ci'ang med pa ni chos kyi khams te /
analyzed: ci'ang med pa ni chos kyi khams te /
translated: The dharmadhatu is nothing whatsoever.

original: chos kyi khams la yod ces pa'i mtshan ma nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi khams la yod ces pa'i mtshan ma nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no definite characteristic of existence in the dharmadhatu.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: nam mkha' la nges pa'i mtshan nyid med de /
analyzed: nam mkha' la nges pa'i mtshan nyid med de /
translated: Space has no definite characteristic.

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba bzhin chos kyi khams kyang de dang 'dra ste nges pa'i mtshan ma med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba bzhin chos kyi khams kyang de dang 'dra ste nges pa'i mtshan ma med do //
translated: Just as with space, the same is true of the element of dharmas: it has no definitive characteristics.

original: chos kyi mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes bshad de /
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes bshad de /
translated: In order to destroy the characteristics of dharmas, it is explained as the element of dharmas.🔽The absence of elements is the element of dharmas.

original: khams med pa ni chos kyi khams so; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: khams med pa ni chos kyi khams so; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: chos kyi khams ni 'das pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: chos kyi khams ni 'das pa la mi gnas /
translated: The element of dharmas does not abide in the past,

original: ma 'ongs pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa la mi gnas /
translated: does not abide in the future,

original: da ltar la mi gnas te /
analyzed: da ltar la mi gnas te /
translated: and does not abide in the present.

original: rkyen mang po la rag lus pas rkyen dang phrad pa'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes rnam grangs su btags so //
analyzed: rkyen mang po la rag lus pas rkyen dang phrad pa'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes rnam grangs su btags so //
translated: Since it depends on many conditions, it is designated as the element of dharmas because it encounters conditions.

original: sems can gyis ji ltar chos kyi khams zhes btags so //
analyzed: sems can gyis ji ltar chos kyi khams zhes btags so //
translated: Sentient beings designate it as the element of dharmas.

original: mkhas pa dag khams med pa la chos kyi khams su shes te /
analyzed: mkhas pa dag khams med pa la chos kyi khams su shes te /
translated: The wise know that the absence of elements is the element of dharmas.

original: chos kyi @64a *//🔽khams ni gcig pa ma yin /
analyzed: chos kyi @64a *// khams ni gcig pa ma yin /
translated: The element of dharmas

original: tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: is neither one nor different.

original: chos kyi khams la chos kyi khams kyi mtshan ma mang po'ang med /
analyzed: chos kyi khams la chos kyi khams kyi mtshan ma mang po'ang med /
translated: The element of dharmas has no many characteristics of the element of dharmas,

original: cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: cung zad kyang med de /
translated: not even the slightest.

original: khams bsten pa'i thabs kyis chos kyi khams la khams zhes bshad do //
analyzed: khams bsten pa'i thabs kyis chos kyi khams la khams zhes bshad do //
translated: The method of relying on the elements is explained as the element of dharmas.

original: gang rnal 'byor pa dag chos kyi khams rtogs shing chud pa ni khams med par shes shing mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang rnal 'byor pa dag chos kyi khams rtogs shing chud pa ni khams med par shes shing mthong ngo //
translated: Those who understand and penetrate the element of dharmas see and know that it is without elements.

original: khams gsum gyi chos kyi khams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma med de /
analyzed: khams gsum gyi chos kyi khams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma med de /
translated: The element of dharmas in the three realms has no conceptual characteristics.

original: rgyu dang / rkyen mang po 'dus pa las chos su rnam pa rtog pa'i chos kyi khams zhes bshad de /
analyzed: rgyu dang / rkyen mang po 'dus pa las chos su rnam pa rtog pa'i chos kyi khams zhes bshad de /
translated: It is explained as the element of dharmas that are conceptualized from the combination of many causes and conditions.

original: chos su rnam par phye ste mtshan nyid nges pa med pa bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes bshad do //
analyzed: chos su rnam par phye ste mtshan nyid nges pa med pa bstan pa'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes bshad do //
translated: In order to teach that the characteristics of the distinctions of dharmas are not definite, it is explained as the element of dharmas.

original: mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi khams la mtshan mar lta ba'i phyir chos skyes par mthong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi khams la mtshan mar lta ba'i phyir chos skyes par mthong ba ma yin te /
translated: The wise do not see the arising of dharmas because they do not view the element of dharmas as having characteristics.

original: gang skyes pa'i chos de nyid ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gang skyes pa'i chos de nyid ma skyes pa'o //
translated: Any dharma that arises is itself non-arisen.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos kyi khams la mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi khams la mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the element of dharmas is without characteristics.

original: mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi mtshan nyid la mtshan ma med par rtog cing chud pas chos kyi khams la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni chos kyi mtshan nyid la mtshan ma med par rtog cing chud pas chos kyi khams la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi khams zhes gsungs so //
translated: The wise understand that the characteristics of phenomena are signless. Therefore, the signless realm of phenomena is said to be the realm of phenomena because it is free from the signs of conceptualization.

original: chos kyi khams la gnas pa'i gnas med /
analyzed: chos kyi khams la gnas pa'i gnas med /
translated: The realm of phenomena has no location.

original: gnas pa med /
analyzed: gnas pa med /
translated: It has no abiding.

original: 'byung ba'i gnas med /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i gnas med /
translated: It has no location of arising.

original: rten pa'i gnas med do //
analyzed: rten pa'i gnas med do //
translated: It has no location of support.

original: chos kyi khams ni thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos kyi khams la skyes ba @64b med do //
analyzed: chos kyi khams ni thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos kyi khams la skyes ba @64b med do //
translated: Because the realm of phenomena is originally unborn, there is no arising in the realm of phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos kyi khams la khams med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi khams la khams med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the realm of phenomena is not a realm.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang // chos kyi khams na 'dus pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang // chos kyi khams na 'dus pa'i phyir yod pa ma yin te /
translated: the realm of phenomena is not existent because it is not included.

original: ma 'dus pa /🔽ma gyes pa /
analyzed: ma 'dus pa / ma gyes pa /
translated: It is not included.🔽It is not differentiated.

original: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa /
analyzed: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa /
translated: It is not conditioned.

original: des pa med pas chos kyi khams zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des pa med pas chos kyi khams zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is not a basis. Therefore, it is said to be the realm of phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar khams med pa la chos kyi khams su rnam par 'byed cing rtogs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar khams med pa la chos kyi khams su rnam par 'byed cing rtogs so //
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas thus discern and realize the dharma-constituent as the absence of constituents.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par 'byed cing rtog pa zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par 'byed cing rtog pa zhe na /
translated: how do bodhisattva-mahāsattvas discern and realize the consciousness constituent of the mental faculty?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di snyam du mi skyes pa'i khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di snyam du mi skyes pa'i khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams /
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas think, ‘The unborn constituent is the consciousness constituent of the mental faculty.

original: ma nges pa'i khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so; ;yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la dngos po med /
analyzed: ma nges pa'i khams ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so; ;yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la dngos po med /
translated: The indeterminate constituent is the consciousness constituent of the mental faculty. The consciousness constituent of the mental faculty has no substance.

original: nges pa'i chos med de /
analyzed: nges pa'i chos med de /
translated: It has no definite quality.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chos med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
translated: I have taught the defining characteristic of the absence of the dharma of the consciousness constituent of the mental faculty.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs su med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs su med do //
translated: The mind-consciousness element is not apprehended in the mind-consciousness element.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa /
translated: The mind-consciousness element is unreal,

original: ci'ang med pa /
analyzed: ci'ang med pa /
translated: nonexistent,

original: phyin ci log dang ldan pa /
analyzed: phyin ci log dang ldan pa /
translated: and inverted.

original: yid thog mar 'gro ba las chos su rnam par shes pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes gsungs so //🔽bus pa so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bsnyeg pa'i phyir yid kyi @65a *//
analyzed: yid thog mar 'gro ba las chos su rnam par shes pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes gsungs so // bus pa so so'i skye bo'i rjes su bsnyeg pa'i phyir yid kyi @65a *//
translated: It is called mind-consciousness because the consciousness of phenomena arises from the mind going in front.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is called the mind-consciousness element because it follows the childish ordinary beings.🔽The noble ones know and understand the mind-consciousness element as not an element.

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis ni khams ma yin pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su shes shing rtogs; yang dag pa ma yin pa ci'ang med pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis ni khams ma yin pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su shes shing rtogs; yang dag pa ma yin pa ci'ang med pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtogs so //
translated: They understand the mind-consciousness element as unreal, nonexistent, and inverted.

original: de'ang rgyu dang / rkyen gyi chos bstan pa'i phyir yid thog mar 'gro bas shes na rkyen mang po 'dus pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bshad do //
analyzed: de'ang rgyu dang / rkyen gyi chos bstan pa'i phyir yid thog mar 'gro bas shes na rkyen mang po 'dus pas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bshad do //
translated: In order to explain the phenomena of causes and conditions, the mind is first mentioned. If one understands this, it is explained as the mind-consciousness element, since many conditions are assembled.

original: de'ang sems can ji ltar shes pa'i rjes su bsnyag pa'i phyir de skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de'ang sems can ji ltar shes pa'i rjes su bsnyag pa'i phyir de skad ces gsungs so //
translated: This is said in order to follow how sentient beings understand.

original: mkhas pa dag ni khams ma yin pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su shes so //
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni khams ma yin pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su shes so //
translated: The wise understand that what is not an element is the mind-consciousness element.

original: de'ang rgyu dang / rkyen mang po 'dus pa dang / rnam par brtags pa las byung ste /
analyzed: de'ang rgyu dang / rkyen mang po 'dus pa dang / rnam par brtags pa las byung ste /
translated: This arises from the assembly of many causes and conditions and from conceptualization.

original: gang khams la mtshan ma med pa ni don dam pa ste /
analyzed: gang khams la mtshan ma med pa ni don dam pa ste /
translated: That which is without marks in the elements is the ultimate.

original: don dam pa la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
analyzed: don dam pa la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do //
translated: In the ultimate, there are no characteristics of the elements.

original: kun rdzob kyi chos su sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes gsungs te; de'ang sems can gdag khams med pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi chos su sems can smin par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes gsungs te; de'ang sems can gdag khams med pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to ripen sentient beings in the phenomena of the relative, the mind-consciousness element is taught, because sentient beings understand that what is without an element is the mind-consciousness element.

original: de'ang chos cung zad tsam gyis kyang khams gzhom zhing de las dben par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'ang chos cung zad tsam gyis kyang khams gzhom zhing de las dben par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes gsungs so //
translated: In order to destroy the elements and be free from them, even to a slight degree, it is called the element of mental consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i @65b khams nang na gnas par ram /
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i @65b khams nang na gnas par ram /
translated: Noble ones do not consider the element of mental consciousness to be located within the element of mental consciousness,🔽or the element of mental consciousness to be located outside the element of mental consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams phyir rol na gnas par ram /🔽gnyis ka'i bar na gnas par mi gnas so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams phyir rol na gnas par ram / gnyis ka'i bar na gnas par mi gnas so //
translated: or the element of mental consciousness to be located somewhere in between.

original: mkhas pa dag ni 'du ba med pa'i khams la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtogs te /
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni 'du ba med pa'i khams la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtogs te /
translated: The wise understand the element of mental consciousness to be the element of non-aggregation.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis bar khams ni mi shes /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis bar khams ni mi shes /
translated: The element of mental consciousness does not know the element of mental consciousness,

original: yid kyi khams la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi shes so; ;de'ang rgyu dang / rkyen mang po 'dus pa dang / phyi ci log las skye zhing 'byung ste /
analyzed: yid kyi khams la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi shes so; ;de'ang rgyu dang / rkyen mang po 'dus pa dang / phyi ci log las skye zhing 'byung ste /
translated: and the element of mental consciousness does not know the element of mind. It arises and occurs from the aggregation of many causes and conditions and from the inversion of what is not so.

original: yid thog mar 'gro bas rgyu dang / rkyen gnyis 'dus pa las 'byung bar shes so //
analyzed: yid thog mar 'gro bas rgyu dang / rkyen gnyis 'dus pa las 'byung bar shes so //
translated: The mind is the cause, and the two factors of cause and condition are united.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa la chags pa dang / kun brtags pa las skyes te /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa la chags pa dang / kun brtags pa las skyes te /
translated: It arises from attachment to what is not real and from the imagined.

original: sems can la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes brjod do //
analyzed: sems can la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes brjod do //
translated: In order to show the characteristics of consciousness to sentient beings, it is called the mind-consciousness element.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa la mi gnas /
translated: Mind-consciousness does not abide in the past,

original: ma 'ongs pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa la mi gnas /
translated: does not abide in the future,

original: da ltar la mi gnas so //
analyzed: da ltar la mi gnas so //
translated: and does not abide in the present.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs la /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs la /
translated: Mind-consciousness does not come from anywhere,

original: gang du'ang ma song /
analyzed: gang du'ang ma song /
translated: does not go anywhere,

original: gnas pa'i gnas med de /
analyzed: gnas pa'i gnas med de /
translated: and has no place to abide.

original: thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is characterized by being unborn from the beginning.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la thog ma'i dngos por nges pa'i chos med do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la thog ma'i dngos por nges pa'i chos med do //
translated: In mind-consciousness there is no dharma that can be ascertained as an initial entity.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma gnyis su med de mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma gnyis su med de mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: The mind-consciousness element has no two characteristics, but is without characteristics.

original: mtshan ma de ni mtshan ma gnyis kyi phyir yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshan ma de ni mtshan ma gnyis kyi phyir yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This characteristic does not exist for the sake of the two characteristics.

original: bstan du med pa nyid ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i @66a *//
analyzed: bstan du med pa nyid ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i @66a *//
translated: The characteristic of being imperceptible is the characteristic of the mental consciousness.

original: so; ;mkhas pa dag ni de ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtogs shing khong du chud nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de chos thams cad la mi gnas /
analyzed: so; ;mkhas pa dag ni de ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtogs shing khong du chud nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de chos thams cad la mi gnas /
translated: The wise, in this way, understand and comprehend the mental consciousness element. Having understood the mental consciousness element, they understand that the mental consciousness element does not abide in any phenomenon,

original: yul na mi gnas /
analyzed: yul na mi gnas /
translated: does not abide in an object,

original: phyogs na mi gnas te /🔽chos thams cad dang gcig pa'am /
analyzed: phyogs na mi gnas te / chos thams cad dang gcig pa'am /
translated: and does not abide in a direction.

original: tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs so //
analyzed: tha dad pa ma yin par rtogs so //
translated: They understand that it is neither the same as nor different from all phenomena.

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis ma skyes pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtogs so //
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis ma skyes pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtogs so //
translated: The noble ones understand that the mental consciousness element is non-arising.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni 'ongs pa med /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ni 'ongs pa med /
translated: The mental consciousness element does not come,

original: song ba'ang med /
analyzed: song ba'ang med /
translated: does not go,

original: dmigs pa'ang med do //
analyzed: dmigs pa'ang med do //
translated: and does not have an object.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; don dam pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi dmigs /🔽dmigs su med /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; don dam pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi dmigs / dmigs su med /
translated: Why is that? The mental consciousness element is not apprehended, is not apprehended as an object,

original: bstan du med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bstan du med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and is not apprehended as a direction in the ultimate.

original: mkhas pa dag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la byed pa /🔽dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma byas pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtogs /
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la byed pa / dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma byas pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtogs /
translated: The wise understand the mental consciousness to be the element.🔽Because it is imperceptible, they understand and realize the unconditioned to be the mental consciousness element.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la skye ba'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ma skyes par chud cing rtogs so //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la skye ba'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ma skyes par chud cing rtogs so //
translated: Because there are no signs of birth in the mental consciousness element, they understand and realize the unborn.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la de ltar rnam par 'byed cing rtog go; byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar rtog pa'i tshe 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la ma skyes pa nyid dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la de ltar rnam par 'byed cing rtog go; byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar rtog pa'i tshe 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la ma skyes pa nyid dang /
translated: bodhisattva mahāsattvas analyze and understand the mental consciousness element in this way. When bodhisattvas analyze in this way, they analyze and understand the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm to be unborn

original: ci'ang med pa @66b nyid du rnam par 'byed cing rtogs so //
analyzed: ci'ang med pa @66b nyid du rnam par 'byed cing rtogs so //
translated: and to be nothing whatsoever.

original: ji ltar rtog ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar rtog ce na /
translated: How do they analyze?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽'dod pa'i khams la 'dod pa'i khams med /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / 'dod pa'i khams la 'dod pa'i khams med /
translated: It is like this:🔽The desire realm has no desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams la gzugs kyi khams med /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams la gzugs kyi khams med /
translated: The form realm has no form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams la gzugs med pa'i khams med de /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams la gzugs med pa'i khams med de /
translated: In the formless realm, the formless realm does not exist.

original: khams kyi khams med pa'i chos ston pas 'dod pa'i khams la 'jug par dga' ba la ni 'dod pa'i khams ston to //
analyzed: khams kyi khams med pa'i chos ston pas 'dod pa'i khams la 'jug par dga' ba la ni 'dod pa'i khams ston to //
translated: Since the teaching of the realm of dharmas is without a realm, for those who delight in engaging the desire realm, the desire realm is taught.

original: gzugs kyi khams la 'jug par dga' ba la ni gzugs kyi khams ston to //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams la 'jug par dga' ba la ni gzugs kyi khams ston to //
translated: For those who delight in engaging the form realm, the form realm is taught.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams la 'jug par dga' ba la ni gzugs med pa'i khams ston to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams la 'jug par dga' ba la ni gzugs med pa'i khams ston to //
translated: For those who delight in engaging the formless realm, the formless realm is taught.

original: khams kyis khams med pa mtshon cing brjod do //
analyzed: khams kyis khams med pa mtshon cing brjod do //
translated: The realm is indicated and expressed as being without a realm.

original: mkhas pa dag ni ci'ang med pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes so //
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni ci'ang med pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes so //
translated: The wise know that the realm of nothing whatsoever is the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: mkhas pa dag ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su mi dmigs so //
translated: The wise do not apprehend the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: khams gsum yang dngos po med pa nges pa'i chos med de /
analyzed: khams gsum yang dngos po med pa nges pa'i chos med de /
translated: The three realms are also ascertained to be dharmas that are insubstantial.

original: rgyu dang rkyen mang po las skyes par shes pas de bas na mkhas pa dag ni khams med pa na khams gsum du shes so //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen mang po las skyes par shes pas de bas na mkhas pa dag ni khams med pa na khams gsum du shes so //
translated: Therefore, the wise know that the three realms are not realms.

original: de la khams med de /
analyzed: de la khams med de /
translated: There is no realm there.

original: khams gsum char yang yang dag pa ma yin pa phyir ci log gis 'gro'o //
analyzed: khams gsum char yang yang dag pa ma yin pa phyir ci log gis 'gro'o //
translated: The three realms are all unreal, and they are created by error.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽mkhas pa dag ni khams gsum du mi dmigs pas khams gsum la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi mi @67a *//
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / mkhas pa dag ni khams gsum du mi dmigs pas khams gsum la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi mi @67a *//
translated: Why is this?

original: dmigs mi brjod do //
analyzed: dmigs mi brjod do //
translated: The wise do not apprehend the three realms, and so they do not apprehend or describe the three realms as past, future, or present.

original: 'phags pa rnams kyis ni khams gsum la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / ci'ang med par rang bzhin med pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa rnams kyis ni khams gsum la yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / ci'ang med par rang bzhin med pa /
translated: The noble ones understand that the three realms are unreal, nonexistent, and essenceless,

original: chos rnams dang bral ba /
analyzed: chos rnams dang bral ba /
translated: that they are devoid of dharmas,

original: phyin ci log las byung bar rtogs te /
analyzed: phyin ci log las byung bar rtogs te /
translated: and that they arise from error.

original: skye bo mang po'i phyir ci log yongs su gcad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skye bo mang po'i phyir ci log yongs su gcad pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to eliminate error for the sake of many people,

original: khams gsum shes shing mthong bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par phye ste gsungs so //
analyzed: khams gsum shes shing mthong bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par phye ste gsungs so //
translated: the Tathāgata has distinguished and taught the three realms so that they may be known and seen.

original: khams gsum gyi dngos po bstan pa'ang sems can dag khams med pa'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir khams gsum gsungs te khams kyi dngos por ma yin no //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi dngos po bstan pa'ang sems can dag khams med pa'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir khams gsum gsungs te khams kyi dngos por ma yin no //
translated: The teaching on the entities of the three realms is also taught in order to make sentient beings understand the meaning of the absence of realms, not as the entities of the realms.

original: mkhas pa dag ni khams gsum ni khams med par shes shing rtogs so //
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni khams gsum ni khams med par shes shing rtogs so //
translated: The wise understand and realize that the three realms are without realms.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar rtog pa'i tshes sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams ni nam mkha'i khams te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar rtog pa'i tshes sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams ni nam mkha'i khams te /
translated: when bodhisattva mahāsattvas contemplate in this way, they realize that the realm of sentient beings and the realm of the self are the realm of space.

original: chos kyi khams med pa dang / ci'ang med pa'i khams dang / ma skyes pa'i khams su rtogs so //
analyzed: chos kyi khams med pa dang / ci'ang med pa'i khams dang / ma skyes pa'i khams su rtogs so //
translated: They realize that the realm of phenomena is the realm of nonexistence, the realm of nothingness, and the realm of nonarising.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams dang / nam mkha' bye brag med de tha mi dad do //
analyzed: sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams dang / nam mkha' bye brag med de tha mi dad do //
translated: The realm of sentient beings, the realm of the self, and space are without distinction and are not separate.

original: khams kyi mtshan nyid de dag kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa las byung ste /
analyzed: khams kyi mtshan nyid de dag kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa las byung ste /
translated: The characteristics of those realms also arise from what is not real.

original: rkyen mang po las skyes pas khams zhes bya ste de la nges pa'i khams med do //
analyzed: rkyen mang po las skyes pas khams zhes bya ste de la nges pa'i khams med do //
translated: Since it arises from many conditions, it is called an element, but it has no fixed element.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: nam mkha' la gcig tu nges @67b pa'i khams med do //
analyzed: nam mkha' la gcig tu nges @67b pa'i khams med do //
translated: Space has no fixed element.

original: mtshan nyid de dag kyang nam mkha'i khams su rtogs pas khams med pa'i don no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid de dag kyang nam mkha'i khams su rtogs pas khams med pa'i don no //
translated: Since those characteristics are realized in the element of space, they are the meaning of the absence of elements.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this.

original: nam mkha' la khams med pa bzhin du chos kyang mthar mtshan ma dang bral te med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha' la khams med pa bzhin du chos kyang mthar mtshan ma dang bral te med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: Just as space has no elements, so phenomena are ultimately free from characteristics and are characterized by nonexistence.

original: khams thams cad kyang khams dang bral ba'o //🔽khams la khams med de /
analyzed: khams thams cad kyang khams dang bral ba'o // khams la khams med de /
translated: All elements are free from elements.🔽Elements do not exist in elements.

original: khams zhes bya ba nang na mi gnas /
analyzed: khams zhes bya ba nang na mi gnas /
translated: What is called an element does not exist internally,

original: phyi rol na mi gnas /
analyzed: phyi rol na mi gnas /
translated: does not exist externally,

original: gnyis ka'i bar na mi gnas te /
analyzed: gnyis ka'i bar na mi gnas te /
translated: and does not exist in between those two.

original: khams kyi nang na khams med do //
analyzed: khams kyi nang na khams med do //
translated: Elements do not exist in elements.

original: med pa ni mtshan nyid du ma bsdus pa khams la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: med pa ni mtshan nyid du ma bsdus pa khams la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Nonexistence is not included in characteristics and does not exist in elements.

original: khams thams cad la gnas med; khams thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o //
analyzed: khams thams cad la gnas med; khams thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o //
translated: All elements are without location; all elements are unborn.

original: mkhas pa dag ni khams kyi rnams la khams skye bar mi dmigs /🔽khams la 'gog par mi dmigs /
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni khams kyi rnams la khams skye bar mi dmigs / khams la 'gog par mi dmigs /
translated: The wise do not observe the arising of elements in the elements,🔽do not observe the cessation of elements in the elements,

original: khams la gnas par mi dmigs so //
analyzed: khams la gnas par mi dmigs so //
translated: and do not observe the abiding of elements in the elements.

original: khams thams cad ni ma skyes pa /
analyzed: khams thams cad ni ma skyes pa /
translated: All elements are unborn,

original: ma byung ba /
analyzed: ma byung ba /
translated: unoriginated,

original: mi gnas pa /
analyzed: mi gnas pa /
translated: nonabiding,

original: thog ma nas dmigs su med pa'o //
analyzed: thog ma nas dmigs su med pa'o //
translated: and originally unobservable.

original: mkhas pa dag ni ming tsam du btags pa'i khams la mi chags /
analyzed: mkhas pa dag ni ming tsam du btags pa'i khams la mi chags /
translated: The wise are not attached to the elements, which are merely designated by names.

original: chags par mi byed /
analyzed: chags par mi byed /
translated: They do not become attached,

original: mi 'dzin / mi rtog go /
analyzed: mi 'dzin / mi rtog go /
translated: do not grasp, and do not conceptualize.

original: de bas na mkhas pa dag ni khams thams cad la khams ma skyes par shes shing mthong ste /
analyzed: de bas na mkhas pa dag ni khams thams cad la khams ma skyes par shes shing mthong ste /
translated: Therefore, the wise know and see all elements as unborn elements.

original: ma skyes pas na 'gog pa med do /
analyzed: ma skyes pas na 'gog pa med do /
translated: Because they are unborn, they are not ceased.

original: don dam pa la khams thams cad dmigs su med do //
analyzed: don dam pa la khams thams cad dmigs su med do //
translated: Ultimately, all elements are unobservable.

original: kun drdzob tu na chos kyi khams rnams rnam par phye ste brjod do //
analyzed: kun drdzob tu na chos kyi khams rnams rnam par phye ste brjod do //
translated: Conventionally, the elements are distinguished and described.

original: don dam par na khams su brjod pa'ang @68a *//
analyzed: don dam par na khams su brjod pa'ang @68a *//
translated: Ultimately, even the description of elements does not exist.

original: med do // mkhas pa dag ni khams thams cad don dam pa'i don du shes shing rtogs so //
analyzed: med do // mkhas pa dag ni khams thams cad don dam pa'i don du shes shing rtogs so //
translated: The wise know and realize all elements to be ultimate reality.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar khams bco brgyad dang / khams gsum dang / sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams rtogs shing rnam par phye ba khong du chud do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de ltar khams bco brgyad dang / khams gsum dang / sems can gyi khams dang / bdag gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams rtogs shing rnam par phye ba khong du chud do //
translated: Bodhisattva great beings in this way realize, discern, and comprehend the eighteen constituents, the three realms, the realm of sentient beings, the realm of self, and the realm of space.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar khong du chud cing rtogs pa'i tshe khams su mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams de ltar khong du chud cing rtogs pa'i tshe khams su mi dmigs /
translated: When bodhisattvas realize and comprehend in this way, they do not apprehend the constituents.

original: khams su mi mthong /
analyzed: khams su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see the constituents.

original: thams cad kyi ming yang rtogs shing khams thams cad khams med par 'jug pa la yid ches so //
analyzed: thams cad kyi ming yang rtogs shing khams thams cad khams med par 'jug pa la yid ches so //
translated: They also understand the names of all of them and have confidence in the engagement of all constituents in the absence of constituents.

original: khams su rnam par phye ba'ang shes shing kun rdzob tu khams thams cad rnam par phye nas khams thams cad don dam par zhugs par yang shes /
analyzed: khams su rnam par phye ba'ang shes shing kun rdzob tu khams thams cad rnam par phye nas khams thams cad don dam par zhugs par yang shes /
translated: They also know the discernment of the constituents and know the engagement of all constituents in the ultimate truth after having discerned all constituents conventionally.

original: khams med pa'i sbyor ba'ang shes shing sems can rnams la khams rnams rnam par ston te /
analyzed: khams med pa'i sbyor ba'ang shes shing sems can rnams la khams rnams rnam par ston te /
translated: They also know the application of the absence of constituents and teach the constituents to sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams khams kyi sbyor ba la shin tu gnas par yang byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams khams kyi sbyor ba la shin tu gnas par yang byed do //
translated: They also cause sentient beings to abide in the practice of the elements.

original: kun rdzob tu tshig dang / smra bas sems can rnams la khams med pa'i chos ston kyang mtshan ma gnyis su khams mi ston to //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu tshig dang / smra bas sems can rnams la khams med pa'i chos ston kyang mtshan ma gnyis su khams mi ston to //
translated: Although they teach sentient beings the Dharma of the absence of elements through conventional words and speech, they do not teach the elements as two kinds of signs.

original: khams thams cad gnyis su med kyang thabs kyis khams kyi rnams rten cing 'brel te byung bar ston to //
analyzed: khams thams cad gnyis su med kyang thabs kyis khams kyi rnams rten cing 'brel te byung bar ston to //
translated: Although all elements are nondual, they teach the arising of the elements through dependent origination by means of skillful means.

original: kun rdzob tu tshig dang / smra bas sems can rnams smin par byed kyang sems @68b can gyi rnams la don dam pa ston to //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu tshig dang / smra bas sems can rnams smin par byed kyang sems @68b can gyi rnams la don dam pa ston to //
translated: Although they ripen sentient beings through conventional words and speech, they teach the ultimate truth to sentient beings.

original: khams kyi khyad par gyi rnam pa la khams kyang khams thams cad med par yid ches shing rtogs so //
analyzed: khams kyi khyad par gyi rnam pa la khams kyang khams thams cad med par yid ches shing rtogs so //
translated: They believe and understand that the elements are all nonexistent in the aspects of the distinctions of the elements.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pas khams su mi dmigs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pas khams su mi dmigs /
translated: the Tathāgata does not apprehend the elements in the ultimate sense.

original: khams kyi chos su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: khams kyi chos su mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the phenomena of the elements.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: ngas ni khams thams cad 'gags pa'ang med /
analyzed: ngas ni khams thams cad 'gags pa'ang med /
translated: I do not stop all the elements.

original: bcad pa'ang med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: bcad pa'ang med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so //
translated: Without cutting anything off, he attained perfect enlightenment and became a buddha.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: don dam pa la khams kyi rnams med do //
analyzed: don dam pa la khams kyi rnams med do //
translated: In the ultimate truth, there are no elements.

original: khams thams cad la khams gang yang med de /
analyzed: khams thams cad la khams gang yang med de /
translated: In all elements, there are no elements.

original: nges pa med do //
analyzed: nges pa med do //
translated: There is no certainty.

original: khams thams cad nam mkhar 'jug pas khams thams cad ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: khams thams cad nam mkhar 'jug pas khams thams cad ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: All elements are subsumed in space, and all elements are characterized by non-arising.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas khams thams cad la de lta bu'i tshul gyis thugs su chud do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas khams thams cad la de lta bu'i tshul gyis thugs su chud do //
translated: The Tathāgata understands all elements in this way.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas khams su ma gsungs /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas khams su ma gsungs /
translated: The Tathāgata does not speak of elements.

original: chos rnams kyi stobs kyang ma gsungs so //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi stobs kyang ma gsungs so //
translated: He does not speak of the powers of phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: chos thams cad ci yang med pas ci'ang med pa'i khams mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad ci yang med pas ci'ang med pa'i khams mi gsung ngo //
translated: Because all phenomena are nothing whatsoever, he does not speak of the element of nothingness.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokapāla,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas ni ci'ang med pa'i khams gsungs mod kyi de la yang dag par na khams su gsungs pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas ni ci'ang med pa'i khams gsungs mod kyi de la yang dag par na khams su gsungs pa med do //
translated: the Tathāgata does speak of the element of nothingness, but in reality, he does not speak of elements.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: de ltar na khams rnams kyi rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o //🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams khams rnam par 'byed pa la shin @69a *//🔽tu mkhas pa dang / khams thams cad btags pa tsam du shes pa dang / kun rdzob kyi khams tsam du shes pa dang / don dam pa'i khams shes pa dang; khams kyi nges pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob kyi bden pa shes pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na khams rnams kyi rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams khams rnam par 'byed pa la shin @69a *// tu mkhas pa dang / khams thams cad btags pa tsam du shes pa dang / kun rdzob kyi khams tsam du shes pa dang / don dam pa'i khams shes pa dang; khams kyi nges pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob kyi bden pa shes pa dang /
translated: this is called being skilled in discerning the elements.🔽Bodhisattva mahāsattvas are extremely skilled in discerning the elements, they know that all elements are mere imputations, they know that the elements are mere relative reality, they know the ultimate element, they know the ascertainment of the elements, they know relative truth,

original: khams rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / ci dang / ci lta bu dang ldan pa shes pa dang / khams kyi 'dus pa shes pa dang / khams kyi 'jug pa shes pa dang / bden pa'i khams kyi 'jug pa shes pa dang /
analyzed: khams rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa dang / ci dang / ci lta bu dang ldan pa shes pa dang / khams kyi 'dus pa shes pa dang / khams kyi 'jug pa shes pa dang / bden pa'i khams kyi 'jug pa shes pa dang /
translated: they are skilled in discerning the elements, they know what is and what is not, they know the aggregation of the elements, they know the engagement of the elements, they know the engagement of the element of truth,

original: khams kyi khyad par la mkhas pa dang / khams thams cad khams med par shes pa dang / khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams dang mthun par shes te /
analyzed: khams kyi khyad par la mkhas pa dang / khams thams cad khams med par shes pa dang / khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams dang mthun par shes te /
translated: They are skilled in the distinctions of the elements, they know that all elements are not elements, and they know that all elements are in accord with the element of space.

original: khams rnams la bye brag tu mi 'byed pa dang / khams rnams la bye brag tu mi dmigs /
analyzed: khams rnams la bye brag tu mi 'byed pa dang / khams rnams la bye brag tu mi dmigs /
translated: They do not distinguish the elements, they do not observe distinctions among the elements,

original: bye brag tu mi brjod do //
analyzed: bye brag tu mi brjod do //
translated: and they do not make distinctions.

original: sems can rnams la khams 'jig pa ston pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can rnams la khams 'jig pa ston pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They are skilled in teaching sentient beings to destroy the elements.

original: 'jig rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: sgyu ma mkhan mkhas pa zhig sems can la sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te /
analyzed: sgyu ma mkhan mkhas pa zhig sems can la sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te /
translated: A skilled magician shows various illusions to sentient beings

original: sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs shes par byed do //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs shes par byed do //
translated: and makes them understand the various illusory things.

original: de la mdza' zhing bshes ba dag gis /
analyzed: de la mdza' zhing bshes ba dag gis /
translated: Those who are close to him

original: 'di skad du /
analyzed: 'di skad du /
translated: say,

original: 'di ni sgyu ma'o //
analyzed: 'di ni sgyu ma'o //
translated: ‘This is an illusion.

original: sgyu mar byas pa'i dngos po ste /
analyzed: sgyu mar byas pa'i dngos po ste /
translated: It is an illusory thing.

original: sgyu ma de la yang dag pa med do //
analyzed: sgyu ma de la yang dag pa med do //
translated: There is no reality in that illusion.’

original: phyin ci log tu sems can la ston to zhes smras na mkhas pa dag ni sgyu mar shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu sems can la ston to zhes smras na mkhas pa dag ni sgyu mar shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that you teach sentient beings in a distorted way, the wise will understand that it is an illusion.

original: 'jig @69b rten 'dzin /
analyzed: 'jig @69b rten 'dzin /
translated: Lokadhara,

original: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: the nature of the world is like an illusion.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i chos la zhugs na 'jig rten sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du shes so; ;'jig rten spyod pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i chos la zhugs na 'jig rten sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du shes so; ;'jig rten spyod pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste /
translated: When bodhisattva mahāsattvas engage with phenomena that are like illusions, they understand that the world has the nature of an illusion.

original: sbyor ba'i stobs kyis sems can dag la 'jig rten sgyu ma lta bur ston to //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i stobs kyis sems can dag la 'jig rten sgyu ma lta bur ston to //
translated: Through the power of their training, they teach sentient beings that the world is like an illusion.

original: gang zhig 'jig rten la yang dag pa'i bden par 'dzin na 'jig rten yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma lta bur ston to //
analyzed: gang zhig 'jig rten la yang dag pa'i bden par 'dzin na 'jig rten yang dag pa ma yin pa sgyu ma lta bur ston to //
translated: If someone grasps at the world as being a true reality, they teach that the world is unreal and like an illusion.

original: de la mkhas pa /
analyzed: de la mkhas pa /
translated: The wise

original: blo zab mo /
analyzed: blo zab mo /
translated: with profound minds

original: dbang po rno ba dag ni zur tsam bstan pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / mi bden pa dngos po med par shes te /
analyzed: dbang po rno ba dag ni zur tsam bstan pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / mi bden pa dngos po med par shes te /
